title: Seamless: Local Food Delivery
description: When in doubt, go for takeoutâ€”Seamless has it all. Plus, fun fact: Seamless is powered by Grubhub! Order food delivery from thousands of restaurants, including local spots and national chains, and get groceries delivered too. Prefer pickup? No problem. Know the fees upfront and track orders from Seamless delivery partners in real timeâ€”the only surprise is just how easy takeout can be. ORDER FROM THOUSANDS OF RESTAURANTS With Seamless, you can order takeout from your favorite local restaurants and everyoneâ€™s favorite chains. There are so many good eats out there, but you obviously deserve the best. Seamless makes it easier to choose your next meal with restaurant ratings and reviews. French fries, pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donutsâ€”itâ€™s all here, whenever a craving strikes. GET GROCERIES DELIVERED TOO Think beyond your breakfast, lunch, and dinner orders. Seamless offers the ultimate convenience with grocery delivery, in addition to restaurant takeout. Order milk, bread, snacks, and frozen foods, as well as household essentials like paper towels and laundry detergent, from local convenience stores. EXPECT TO SEE THE FEES UPFRONT Seamless gives it to you straight. See the delivery fee upfront, before you start crafting the perfect food order. Pay your way with credit cards, Seamless gift cards, or Venmo. SKIP DELIVERY FEES The key is Grubhub+. Sign up for unlimited $0 delivery fees on eligible orders, and enjoy exclusive offers and rewards as a Grubhub+ member.* Try Grubhub+ free for 30 days, then level up for just $9.99/month. The truth is, food tastes even better when you spend less on delivery. See details below. TRACK DELIVERY IN REAL TIME Seamless puts your delivery on the map. Track eligible orders in real time, from the restaurant to your front door, and know the moment your bacon-egg-and-cheese arrives. Every delivery is a special delivery with Seamless. COUNT ON THE SEAMLESS GUARANTEE Get your food delivered on time and at the lowest price. Guaranteed, or weâ€™ll make it right. See details: seamless.com/help/contact-us/learn-about-guarantee YOU DO YOU AND SEAMLESS DELIVERS Seamless serves up a personalized app experience, so you can reorder that feast youâ€™re still thinking about from two months ago. Order sauce on the side, go for extra pickles, lose the onionsâ€”Seamless gets you. Are you a regular? Get rewarded when you come back for more at the same restaurants. You can also plan ahead by pre-ordering food for pickup or delivery. ORDER FROM NATIONAL RESTAURANTS Sometimes you need a sure thing, and thatâ€™s why Seamless partners with national restaurants to offer the takeout food you know and love. Get delivery from Applebeeâ€™s, Arbyâ€™s, Buffalo Wild Wings, Burger King, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Dennyâ€™s, Dunkinâ€™, Five Guys, IHOP, McDonaldâ€™s, KFC, Panda Express, Panera, Papa Johnâ€™s, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Subway, Taco Bell, Wendyâ€™s, White Castle, and more. GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT Burning questions? Delivery crisis? Seamless customer support is here for you 24/7. *$0 delivery fees only apply to eligible delivery orders from Grubhub+ merchants that meet the subtotal minimum (before tax, tip, and fees) on the applicable menu page or otherwise indicated on the Grubhub platform. Additional fees may apply. 5% pickup credit applicable on eligible future pickup orders only and is calculated based on the qualifying order subtotal. Credit is not transferable, not redeemable for cash, expires 90 days after most recent credit is issued and is subject to restrictions. Grubhub+ is an automatically renewing membership service requiring recurring payments. After your free trial ends, your free trial will convert to a paid Grubhub+ membership and Seamless will automatically charge you each month at the then-current rate (currently $9.99) plus tax until you cancel. See terms: seamless.com/plus
descriptionHTML:
When in doubt, go for takeoutâ€”Seamless has it all. Plus, fun fact: Seamless is powered by Grubhub! Order food delivery from thousands of restaurants, including local spots and national chains, and get groceries delivered too. Prefer pickup? No problem. Know the fees upfront and track orders from Seamless delivery partners in real timeâ€”the only surprise is just how easy takeout can be.

ORDER FROM THOUSANDS OF RESTAURANTS
With Seamless, you can order takeout from your favorite local restaurants and everyoneâ€™s favorite chains. There are so many good eats out there, but you obviously deserve the best. Seamless makes it easier to choose your next meal with restaurant ratings and reviews. French fries, pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donutsâ€”itâ€™s all here, whenever a craving strikes.

GET GROCERIES DELIVERED TOO
Think beyond your breakfast, lunch, and dinner orders. Seamless offers the ultimate convenience with grocery delivery, in addition to restaurant takeout. Order milk, bread, snacks, and frozen foods, as well as household essentials like paper towels and laundry detergent, from local convenience stores.

EXPECT TO SEE THE FEES UPFRONT
Seamless gives it to you straight. See the delivery fee upfront, before you start crafting the perfect food order. Pay your way with credit cards, Seamless gift cards, or Venmo.

SKIP DELIVERY FEES
The key is Grubhub+. Sign up for unlimited $0 delivery fees on eligible orders, and enjoy exclusive offers and rewards as a Grubhub+ member.* Try Grubhub+ free for 30 days, then level up for just $9.99/month. The truth is, food tastes even better when you spend less on delivery. See details below.

TRACK DELIVERY IN REAL TIME
Seamless puts your delivery on the map. Track eligible orders in real time, from the restaurant to your front door, and know the moment your bacon-egg-and-cheese arrives. Every delivery is a special delivery with Seamless.

COUNT ON THE SEAMLESS GUARANTEE
Get your food delivered on time and at the lowest price. Guaranteed, or weâ€™ll make it right. See details: seamless.com/help/contact-us/learn-about-guarantee

YOU DO YOU AND SEAMLESS DELIVERS
Seamless serves up a personalized app experience, so you can reorder that feast youâ€™re still thinking about from two months ago. Order sauce on the side, go for extra pickles, lose the onionsâ€”Seamless gets you. Are you a regular? Get rewarded when you come back for more at the same restaurants. You can also plan ahead by pre-ordering food for pickup or delivery.

ORDER FROM NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Sometimes you need a sure thing, and thatâ€™s why Seamless partners with national restaurants to offer the takeout food you know and love. Get delivery from Applebeeâ€™s, Arbyâ€™s, Buffalo Wild Wings, Burger King, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Dennyâ€™s, Dunkinâ€™, Five Guys, IHOP, McDonaldâ€™s, KFC, Panda Express, Panera, Papa Johnâ€™s, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Subway, Taco Bell, Wendyâ€™s, White Castle, and more.

GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT
Burning questions? Delivery crisis? Seamless customer support is here for you 24/7.

*$0 delivery fees only apply to eligible delivery orders from Grubhub+ merchants that meet the subtotal minimum (before tax, tip, and fees) on the applicable menu page or otherwise indicated on the Grubhub platform. Additional fees may apply. 5% pickup credit applicable on eligible future pickup orders only and is calculated based on the qualifying order subtotal. Credit is not transferable, not redeemable for cash, expires 90 days after most recent credit is issued and is subject to restrictions. Grubhub+ is an automatically renewing membership service requiring recurring payments. After your free trial ends, your free trial will convert to a paid Grubhub+ membership and Seamless will automatically charge you each month at the then-current rate (currently $9.99) plus tax until you cancel. See terms: seamless.com/plus
summary: Food delivery or pick-up in New York, all with Seamless, powered by Grubhub.

scraped_reviews.content: Forced to create account to make order, no option to type in letters for unit number, order was canceled 5 min before it was supposed to arrive....so I had no time to order from a new place..... got a call from someone in India (not sure what they said cause I couldn't understand them).. they are refunding my payment in 5 days and gave me a $7 credit on their app that I will never use again.

The app was confusing to say the least!My first order was canceled so they gave me a credit which was ok. my second order the driver went to a second stop before delivering my order. the second pickup was atleast 2 miles in the opposite direction. by the time I got my food it was room temperature. they can keep my remaining 7 dollars in credit! I'll never us this service again!

No option to check out as a guest. I was in a rush to place an order and had to make a new account and verify the email. Then when I thought I was ready to place the order and had entered all my items it just tells me "you don't have enough budget for this order". Nowhere else on that screen does it show where I can put a credit card in or do anything to increase my budget. There's a payment info section, but all that shows is a promo code section. Frustrating and non-intuitive.

Seamless is pretty terrible. You will end up paying double what you would if you picked up. Most restaurants are horrible at delivery; they take forever, your food is cold and often incorrect, and sometimes it NEVER COMES. Imagine waiting for hours for food only to find out the order has been cancelled! But worst of all, is how expensive the app is.

Logs me out after every use of the app. Annoying. Asks for a review after each use even though I've already reviewed it. Its a bad app. Somehow it has a monopoly on food delivery even though its buggy with ridiculous fees. That's the review. Now and always Displays lots of restaurants that are either closed or don't deliver to my location. Let's me get thru the order process only to tell me I can't buy from them at the very end. Perhaps if a place isn't available, don't display it as available
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at +18002561020 so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has had its ups and downs, but lately someone had the bright idea to completely eliminate customer service. Now if you order a meal and the restaurant messes up and sends you someone else's order you no longer get a full refund. You only get a partial. That's right you sit there with no meal, waiting 3-5 business days for a refund that only covers half your order. Might as well throw money out your window. The new system is fully automated so if your option isn't there. Too bad. ðŸ‘Ž ðŸ‘Ž

Not great. They'll quote you a delivery time, and once the upper bound is passed, you check the app, and they've just moved the delivery window back 40 minutes. You order is supposed to arrive in 35 minutes, but actually takes 90 minutes with no notification of the change. Seamless is only for people who aren't hungry when they place the order. Previous: Real good. Didn't get my food one night, was refunded no problem as soon as I emailed them the next day. great customer service

I use this app when working in Port Arthur, TX. I work long 12-hour shifts and prefer to have my food delivered. Seamless and Grubhub both are extremely inconsistent when showing which restaurants are available for delivery, even when most of those same restaurants will pop up when you select pickup. Sometimes, if you refresh enough times, restaurants will pop back up in the delivery options. Otherwise, you're just plain out of luck. Very frustrating to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at +18002561020 so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: Encourage restaurants to give more details about dishes, especially concerning portion sizes. Improve your filters. One of them should be a filter based on payment types accepted by the restaurants. Sorting through restaurants could be improved as well. Edit: In 2 years, none of these things have happened. Also, I hate needing to go through a bunch of restaurants that aren't open. Make a filter. And don't cancel orders 5 minutes before the expected delivery time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew! Thanks for your feedback. We will be passing your feedback to the higher-ups. Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be great but the last many orders have all been late and cold because Seamless can't find enough drivers in my area to pick up orders. Every time this happens, the delivery estimates just keep getting pushed back and there's no explanation in the app. You also aren't allowed to cancel the order through the app, which is horrible. You have to wait forever on hold or wait forever for some chat bot, explain things 3 times, and all of this while you're hungry. What happened to this app??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew, we understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: Hides delivery fees and won't correctly sort by them. I'm not paying 6.99 for delivery. Making me click through 20 restaurants charging that and more is an irritating waste of my time. ==Update 2020== I didn't think it could possibly get any worse and yet.. Now I can't even click on a restaurant to find out what the fee is. I need to order something and look if the fee is acceptable then go back and actually order. I also can no longer filter by open now. WHY DO YOU HATE YOUR USERS
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our tech team is working to improve the sort features on our platform. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience of the fees not being apparent and easily presented to make your selection. Please bear with us as we make updates. Thank you so much for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Dropping my rating temporarily. I am perplexed why there is no option to save restaurants that I want to try later. I might browse 30 places and find 5 that I like, but there is no way to remind myself to check certain places out later. I can only order from 1 per night and you capture my favorites, let me build my own wishlist based on interests.

They don't let you cancel orders. I tried to cancel an order literally as soon as I ordered it and I was not allowed to cancel it. Their service fees and delivery fees are also way more pricey than GrubHub, Doordash, and Postmates. We tried this service because they had a favorite place of ours. We won't be using it again. It's too expensive and not being able to cancel is ridiculous. Eventually they refunded the service fee which was something, but we are going back to the other services
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Meghan, we're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: I used this app for 2 years, and i've noticed the decline in quality ever since the last update. On numerous occasions I have place to my order, and the driver takes forever to get to its destination. I paid 4 for orders at one point, and it never got delivered. They kept moving the times to later times, until inevitably it never came. I must say, I am truly disappointed by this lack of service.

I only ordered through this service twice. The first time I applied a discount for a first time user, my food never arrived and while my money was eventually returned, I missed out on the discount. Fair enough. The second time I ordered, my estimated arrival time jumped an additional half an hour, arrived cold, and with one of only two items missing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jerry, we understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: Needs a lot more improvement. Too many bugs. Doesn't accept credit card most of the times giving the reason "restaurants don't accept this form of payment". So have to pay through PayPal everytime. A few times I got the wrong food. They initiated the refund, but I never got the money back. Just a horrible system. I would recommend this app for the promotions sometimes I guess? But not for any other reason.

The OG food ordering app. Used to be the best of the best. Sadly the service has deteriorated, marred by frequent confusion with the restaurant, as well as cancelled and delayed orders. Giving credits doesn't make up for not getting food, especially when there are so many alternatives with consistent service. I hope they step it back up!

Changing my review to give it one star. Filters used to be more flexible, but it seems they've intentionally made it harder to filter. Used to allow you to specify how many stars, $$, etc, and now you can only sort by ONE of these instead of filtering by as many as you want. I'll probably only order from restaurants i already know with this system. They also don't tell you delivery fee until check-out, which changes restaurant by restaurant.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: Have used the app for a while. Didnt notice much at first, but over time I have come to hate this service (or lack thereof). Several times I have been left without receiving my food. When I am, little is done by their poor customer service representatives, with their insincere auto responses. I had referred several friends to the service but will instead will now be encouraging others not to use the service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: Just bad service - number of times the delivery just failed to arrive or was terribly late. I've used them for years, but the last failed order was enough - they don't really seem to care for their customers. When the food doesn't arrive, Seamless takes no responsibility and pegs it on the restaurant, but then still insists on taking a huge cut / delivery fee each time. There is plenty of competition out there, not worth using their service.

I have been using this app for years and that I have noticed the prices are ridiculously high, I get Seamless needs to make their portion of money, but it's too much, also still don't like the fact the money gets taking out right for an order that hasn't had confirmation to be prepared yet. That needs to change hate when the money comes out and then to get a call for the order to be canceled and have to wait for refund. The app is good just still needs work.

Worst experience ever. Do not recommend seamless. My wife has a gift card that we tried to use. But there was an error and we couldn't make the order. We were told we have to WAIT 48 HOURS! for it to be resolved. Fine, whatever, errors happen. We're hangry. We move on. We tried to order again 1 week later and the error is still there! This time, no ETA on when it'll be resolved. Just that "we'll contact you". I would give this -5 stars if I could.

Worst delivery service. They have some scam going on where you order and it gets assigned to someone, the delivery gets delayed continuously, and then when it finally gets picked up, the order gets mysteriously canceled by some unknown party and the food somehow disappears. 2 hours and multiple calls to seamless and no food. Yet it was in route when it was "canceled". Also gotta wait 5-10 days for my refund. And they said they can't contact me to follow up on this issue. What a scam!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please accept our sincere apologies. Can you please update the order details here or contact us at 8775851085 so that we can have a look into this right away?

scraped_reviews.content: 95% of the restaurants listed are ghost kitchens. You'll scroll through 3-5 pages of the same restaurant listed 20 consecutive times with different names. No way to hide restaurants you've had bad experiences with. This app has been left to rot by whoever purchased the company, and nothing is left for you here but bad puns, frozen food, and exorbitant service fees. Avoid at all costs. Edit:. You'll be told you can't cancel orders, but then they'll get cancelled 30 minutes later. Uninstalled

Avoid. It may be convenient, but sometimes you get screwed over and seamless will do nothing to help. My food delivery never showed up, and while they'll do anything to get new customers, I was ordering daily and they wouldn't issue a coupon or anything to after I waited hours for nothing. This happened multiple times. On top of that, they hold the money for 5 days even though your order never arrives. Talk about hangry..ðŸ˜¤

My experience has gotten worse with seamless system of ordering food. I placed an order, the restaurant canceled my order because they didn't carry an item that was on their menu. The restaurant didn't contact me to tell me of the cancellation. To make matters worse the application said the order was delivered, and my bank account was charged. Here's the kicker; money won't be refunded till 5 business days. So no food, no money refund, and no communication. Beautiful!ðŸ¤£
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please accept our sincere apologies. Can you please update the order details here or contact us at +18002561020 so that we can have a look into this right away?

scraped_reviews.content: Over the years seamless has allowed restaurants to add on additional fees and refuses to let users sort by these fees. I (and many others) had to complain to seamless just to be able to sort by delivery fee which is absurd. If there was an alternative I would probabaly use it but there isnt. On a plus note seamless customer service has always been great to me. I do feel bad for the restaurants though. Seamless charges an amount that puts some smaller restaurants out of business.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: It's great that you can order on the fly so the food is waiting for you. Very easy to use. More accuracy with predicted delivery times would be a huge improvement. Similar to that, there should be a special note to indicate you're ordering from a restaurant far away from you which could increase the delivery estimate and you should check if orders from distant restaurants are arriving in poor condition. If yes there should be a way to tell the customers. Thank you, Seamless!

Has anyone ever successfully used the "contactless delivery" option? I've selected it dozens of times, always with instructions for contactless delivery in the order as well. Resteraunts don't know what it is, hate when you select it, and will just refuse to deliver your order with no explanation if you don't actually come to the door. I've tried it with many restaurants. And when things go wrong, and you lose your money, there's no way to contact seamless.

Sometimes the delivery is fine but my last three deliveries have been extremely late with no updates and/or cancelled at the last minute with no warning. One of these occasions I chatted with a representative who said he couldn't get ahold of my driver, offered me 10% off my next order, and then signed off after asking if he could help with anything else and not waiting for a reply. Far from a seamless experience. Use a different app.

Awful -- I'd give it zero stars if I could. The food is consistently late, which they've made it harder to report, probably because it's just their new norm. Items are missing probably 30% of the time. Drivers are working under fake profiles, and they never read instructions left to make finding the delivery location easier.

I have no problem paying a delivery fee for most places but now they are so hidden and going up that I cannot ignore this any longer. Now you need to put together your order or add a random item to get to the page to see what the location's fees are. So many times I put together an order and see a 6 dollar delivery fee that changes my mind. The mental friction then makes me want to not go through the hassle with another order and chew on a stick of ðŸ¥¦. Other apps have no issue with this..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the convenience, but I hate how they raise the price on everything to make a profit. I feel if they were to do that, it should be by cents, not dollars. On average everything is a dollar more on seamless as opposed to buying it directly from the store/restaurant. UPDATE: Since my last review, I lowered it one star since everything has a delivery fee and service fee now, making even LESS affordable than it was before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are always trying to improve the service. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Useless when it comes to customer service. I ordered a dish with an add on extra. When the food arrived, only the add on extra was on the dish. I complained and all they refunded me was for the amount of the extra add on (even though the food missing on the dish was the actual part of the order and was supposed to be on it.) Seamless' response was just "sorry that's all we can do." I always order from seamless, and this is disappointing. UberEats has a better customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app and use it daily. I have for a long time now. Very easy to use. Consistently delicious and reliable restaurants. Great selection of options. Good offers and promotions. My only reason for retracting a star was for customer service. Months ago I had an issue with missing food. It was a late night order. I contacted customer service a few times with no resolution. I was promised an email or call back I never received. Never resolved. Recently i had the exact same experience. Thankfully an associate named Angelica, it cut resolved after 2 unsuccessful tries previously. I just feel that as the facilitating 3rd party they have as much of a responsibility to resolve these issues as the restaurants they promote.

the app is really good overall. makes it easy to order what you want. the drawbacks come with the review system: for some reason, it always takes me a really long time to figure out how to leave one. placing an order to a place where I haven't left a review, should pop a link up on that place's page. another huge issue, for me, is that when leaving a review, I can't type normally. when I swype, it eats my spaces, and speech to text doesn't work right either. fix those keypress events please.

They will deliver, but if your order doesn't reach on time let say in my case 50min +30min delay. They will ask about if you wait indefinite amount which can again be 1hr you will get 7$ coupon or else they can cancel the order so get lost. Also there is no way to go back to chat after order cancel Also there chat doesn't work on dark mode. Also wait for refund to process. Good for me I am far away from credit limit. So I am going out to buy directly. See you!!

A few months ago, they got rid of the ability to jump to a section of the menu for a restaurant, which makes it much more time consuming to choose dishes, since you have to scroll through every dish to get an idea of what the restaurant offers. The search could also use improvement; searching for "ice cream" will show results that match either "ice" or "cream", which is pretty much never what is intended.

Up until about a week ago, I would have given 4 starts. Now, it just randomly spins, and won't let me complete any orders. When I can actually get an item into the cart, it suddenly makes me have to sign in to my account AGAIN, and then just spins and erases my items. Irritating, since I paid for the preferred delivery service, and now I can't use it. I've un/re-installed several times. No better.

Delivery fees are increasingly buried - they used to be visible from the main menu, then on the restaurant page, and are now only available at checkout. The algorithmic sort is the default, and there's no way to save your preference if you would rather see restaurants listed alphabetically or by distance every time you open the app. Knocking it down from 3 stars to 2 because even though I've already rated, the app keeps prompting me to rate it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Margot, we understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at +18002561020.

scraped_reviews.content: This is not for the app itself, the app is quite good, but it's really ridiculous having to spend $1 usually, but $5 other times because you're 3 blocks further than usual. It's as if the prices are pulled from a hat. Honestly, most of the places I order from, I could just call directly and pay no fee, and that's what I do.

Changed business model, now delivery is not free. Most restaurants now charge an exorbitant fee of up to 6 dollars for delivery unless you pay seamless for a monthly subscription. The app won't let you see which restaurants charge a delivery fee and which don't, you only find that out when you finish your order and by that point, you're "pot committed". That's malicious design if I ever saw it. Keep working on it, or a small start up will overtake you very quickly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always working hard to improve the app. Thanks for your download and feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: The search function has gotten a lot better, and I love how the app remembers your customizations and special instructions for each item you've ordered. While the search function is much better at returning relevant results for food items with more than two words, results returned still include hits for each word individually (and quotes or boolean operators have no effect). Also, I'm concerned that reviews are not anonymous enough and that a restaurant could match reviews with my account.

App update today broke many things, such as losing several categories at restaurants I frequently order at (the entire selection of appetizers is gone at my local diner, for example). That and the tip is now calculated POST tax. update: still a terrible app- the order button is gone completely after you go through checkout. you have to use the website to order, you can't with this app. on the bright side, going to the restaurant websites instead is almost always cheaper or at least the same $.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for letting us know about this and we will look into this further.

scraped_reviews.content: One of the best-made food delivery apps. Very slick sign-ups with Google accounts, no need to type it your details if you're already signed into Android. As far as the actual service goes, the fees aren't that cheap, and most restaurants don't have any way to update order progress back to the app so it's kinda just a surprise when you food arrives early or late.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: With every new app version we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve further.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst app ever. I ordered Taco Bell, they never even started the order until I arrived at my pickup time. Then wouldn't cancel the order and I couldn't wait the 20 extra minutes it was going to help them. I literally lost $85 because I could wait for the food that was 30! Minutes late....and seamless wouldn't help me resolve anything...just took my money. Don't trust this app.

Not feeling the price differences and the beating the restaurants are taking from your ridiculous fees. I've seen the statements from more than 15 different restaurants and its crazy the thievery that exists. I'm not willing to order through them anymore. Time for everyone to stop being so damn lazy, pickup the phone and order your pickups or deliveries. I understand some places won't take orders over the phone, which is crazy, I've experienced it myself, but the majority will take your order.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Important note: the app includes discounts on first time orders from some restaurants. Be wary of them. 4/5 of the times I've tried to use them they didn't work. The total shown at checkout had the discount included, but then I got charged the full amount and the receipt from the app did not reflect the presence of any discount. Customer service cannot correct it either since it was applied automatically not with a code, and the app "is not responsible for any discount which is not applied due to technical failure." Overall good customer service with the app besides this. If your order is messed up they give you a refund, but this will usually only cover the food, not the delivery charge or tip.

Use it all the time and it works for what I need it for. I just wish that the tracking was more accurate. The app will say "your order is on the way" after we're already eating the food for example. I don't think it's actually based on tracking but estimated delivery times which are sometimes very off. The discounts used to be nearly non-existent, but recently there have been more frequent coupons you can use. I wish there was a way to still earn points, even if you're not a paying plus member.

Works well, and I like that it offers nice deals to try some new restaurants. Have problems, though, with ordering. Sometimes restaurants have unscheduled closures. Also security seems to be lax. I had my info stolen and used twice from this site by strangers in spite of strong passwords. Don't save your info on it if you can help it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Munkey Spanc! We're ecstatic to hear you've enjoyed our app and restaurants! Thank you so much for your feedback!

title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
description: Can't stop scrolling? Lack of self-control? Forest is the solution that has the cutest focus timer to help you stay focused and boost productivity! â˜… 2018 Google Play Editorsâ€™ Choice Top Productivity Appâ˜… â˜… 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in 9 countries, including, Canada, France, Japan, Korea and more!â˜… â˜… Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nominationâ˜… â˜… Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Yearâ˜… Plant a seed in Forest when you need to put down your phone and stay focused to get your to do list done. As you stay focused, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. The sense of achievement while seeing a flourishing forest with each tree representing your dedication motivates you to reduce procrastination, and helps you build a good habit of time management! Motivation and Gamification - Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your effort. - Earn rewards by staying focused and unlocking adorable trees! Forest Premium - Statistics: More insightful statistics of your focused time to tailor your focus habits. - Plant Together: Stay focused with your focus friend and family anytime and anywhere. - Plant Real Trees: Plant real trees on Earth to make the world greener! - Allow Lists: Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. descriptionHTML:
Can't stop scrolling? Lack of self-control? Forest is the solution that has the cutest focus timer to help you stay focused and boost productivity!

â˜… 2018 Google Play Editorsâ€™ Choice Top Productivity Appâ˜…

â˜… 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in 9 countries, including, Canada, France, Japan, Korea and more!â˜…

â˜… Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nominationâ˜…

â˜… Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Yearâ˜…

Plant a seed in Forest when you need to put down your phone and stay focused to get your to do list done.

As you stay focused, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither.

The sense of achievement while seeing a flourishing forest with each tree representing your dedication motivates you to reduce procrastination, and helps you build a good habit of time management!

Motivation and Gamification

- Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your effort.
- Earn rewards by staying focused and unlocking adorable trees!

Multiple Focus Modes

- Timer mode: Set your focus session and dive into your work or study flow, or apply Pomodoro technique.
- Stopwatch mode: Start and stop at any time. Count-up timer works great as a habit tracker.

Personalized Experience

- Planting Reminder: Remind yourself that it is time to keep your phone down!
- Custom Phrases: Motivate yourself with your favorite quotes and inspiring words!

Forest Premium

- Statistics: More insightful statistics of your focused time to tailor your focus habits.
- Plant Together: Stay focused with your focus friend and family anytime and anywhere.
- Plant Real Trees: Plant real trees on Earth to make the world greener!
- Allow Lists: Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked.

Exclusive Events on Different Servers: Enjoy various special events customized for different servers/regions.

Download Forest for FREE now to focus on your goals in life and be a better self!

Social Media

Connect with us on Instagram(@forest_app), Twitter(@forestapp_cc), and Facebook(@Forest). Stay tuned for updates and special events!

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at [www.forestapp.cc](http://www.forestapp.cc/)!

NOTICE

- With the Pro version, Forest can be accessed across all your Android devices.
- Downloading a non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase.
- Your data can be synchronized across all platforms by logging in with the same account.
- Due to budget constraints, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five.

Permissions Explained: [https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/](https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/)

On phones running Android 14 and above, we use the AccessibilityService API to help manage the active apps you've included in your interruptive app list, enabling you to better limit your screen time.

Sound Design: Shi Kuang Lee
summary: Stay focused on your goal or to dos and get motivated with Pomodoro timer

scraped_reviews.content: I bought the premium version because I love the idea of this app, but I keep getting a bug when trying to double my coins. also, the UX needs a lot of work. I have a lot of trees, and I don't know what they are unless I go back to the store. I also wish you could use this app when growing trees. And why can't we move trees around? That would double the fun. I also wish we could more easily see different tree stages. I could say more, but I'm near my character limit.

ok, so I've been using Forest for at least a year, if not longer. Would've absolutely given 5 stars and a glowing review up until a week or so ago, when they released the newest update to the app. Now, the app keeps crashing over and over and barely working. So, I did what is always recommended - uninstall and reinstall. NOW, I can't even log in and get all my stuff, despite having purchased the pro version ages ago. Not cool, guys.

I love the concept of this app a lot! But what really marks it down for me and makes it unusable are the ads. For a focus app, it's extremely distracting to get a random and usually very obnoxious ad after a focus session. I appreciate that the full use is a one time payment and that's the biggest reason I'm not giving this that negative of a review, but the way the ads are for the free version I think is just a poor idea.

It's a wonderful little motivator, and one I truly wish I could rate higher. But... Why can't we set 5min intervals? It would be so nice to use the Pomodoro method with this app (that is, set 25min for focus, then 5min for rest, repeat) but the 10min minimum is too long for that. Also, it kind of defeats it's own purpose with the limited-time plants. It's gotten to the point I don't feel much use in opening it because it isn't like I can acquire any of the FOMO anyway :/

This app has been really helpful in keeping me focused on my tasks as well as motivated. However, I've had some issues lately. After I bought 5 real trees, it won't let me buy more. this has been a problem for me since I always looked forward to collecting coins with my finished tasks. This has cause some of my motivation to decrease since my coins just sit there.

This app is hands down the best one Iâ€™ve ever downloaded. It functions like a game but is incredibly effective for focusing on work. After just one week of using it, I've experienced a significant boost in my productivity. I can concentrate for a solid two hours straight while still taking breaks, which research shows enhances memory and focus. I strongly encourage all students who struggle to concentrate to download it right awayâ€”it's a game-changer!

I've been patient because it's a good app that I have used for years, but for almost all of 2025 it has run slower and slower to the point it can barely even open now. Hate to give a bad review but the app is struggling to even function anymore EDIT: My data - which was synced - was completely wiped... Bye forest. It was nice while it lasted.

If you're experiencing slow loading or getting stuck on the progress bar, please update the app to the latest version 4.92.2 , which includes a fix for this issue.

scraped_reviews.content: Beautiful app. I just started using it again, then I spent hours today trying to fix the problem of being able to use any apps i wanted, with no warnings or trees dying until finally i found a message somewhere online that said something about the DEEP FOCUS toggle. Eureka! You have to turn on the deep focus and possibly create your own list of apps that distract you if the default list isn't sufficient for your use. I wish I'd gotten a message telling me how to set it up.

Pretty good, helps me to know how long I have actually been working and provides incentives to focusing. And I can see monthy, weekly, and yearly stats. However, it keeps saying my tree is withered because of the background app being closed, so I've lost two whole study sessions that I get no record of happening or rewarded for, which sucks.

That's the only reason for 1 star less because it seems like its meant to trap you into clicking on the ad. Otherwise it does it's intended job and has helped me keep from going on my phone so often

scraped_reviews.content: This app is excellent. I usually have a problem with focusing a little bit, like looking on my phone etc. but with a timer and a tree, this just helps me bring myself back, especially when I close the app. The only problem I have with this app is the UI, it's too laggy and crashes sometimes, and well, also please consider reducing ads or just turning it into a banner. It's a lot better.

This was a nice app, but I had purchased the 1-time premium upgrade, it seems like the company has switched to a subscription model and just deleted my account instead of sending me a notification about it. EDIT: The forest team sent me an incorrect link, when I got to the correct page for the FAQ, my concern was not addressed in the FAQ. The issue I have is that I had an account and paid for the premium upgrade, before the app implemented the subscription model.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a pro user, having spent real money on buying time crystals too. The app has been crashing so much lately. It auto-closes the moment i do anything in the app. it's such a sad thing since I really adored this app and had been using this app diligently for the last 1 year for increasing productivity and efficiency. please work on the smoother UI and that it doesn't crash, else I'll be forced to switch to other timer apps.

scraped_reviews.content: Close to perfect but sadly has two fatal flaws for me since I'm using this solely to track my tasks through the day, and not really using it to get away from smartphone addiction. 1. Notifications don't work if the app is closed and the countdown in the notification banner is inaccurate. 2. I need to be able to pause the timer during external interruptions. If it weren't for those two things this app would be perfect. Developer please please please fix them! :)

fine as a pomodoro timer, but the pro version is broken (has never worked for me) I'm still seeing ads. any time I click something supposed to be available to pro users, I get a pop-up with a login button saying my pro version has successfully been restored. when I click the button, I see the popup for today's free giveaway, and I'm back to square one. all pro features still disabled. (I'm using the android app on a pixel 7)

The concept is cute, I love all the different plants. However, needing to use notification sounds instead of media sounds to know when your timer has ended seems to be a huge oversight. I get notification sounds from my other apps, and that obviously distracts me. Unless I'm missing something obvious. The app is also very laggy.

I love this app! I just have one request/suggestion tho - to make it possible to edit time slots tags later on. Like for ex, I give myself 60 mins of studying. But say, if I'm done completing the chapter in less than 60 mins(say 40min), I'll usually move on to my next work or take a break. But the clock still running saying I'm studying. So if later I'm able to edit the TAGS atleast and say that in the last 20 mins I did something else, then I can keep a better track of how I spent my time.

I've found this app to be very helpful. I struggle to do my work consistently and can spend hours scrolling away on my phone. This app stops that by setting a time where you're not using your phone. I like that the free version still allows you to call and text without killing your trees as it's an essential function on the phone. If you like background noise, don't sleep on what they provide. Click the headphones at the top right corner of the screen once you start your timer. Happy planting!!!

I liked this app at first. I enjoyed the concept of planting trees + bushes while studying or taking a break. However, it doesn't notify me when the timer ends very well. I've checked my phone's notif settings + the apps; I'm not sure whats going on. Also, I wish there were more rewards for completing the timer (besides a pretty plant). I feel bored. I might as well use a normal timer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please refer to this article to configure your device settings: https://faq.seekrtech.com/Forest/articles/106 or email us at android.support@forestapp.cc if you need further assistance. Besides, you can also earn coins by focusing so that you can unlock more tree species to flourish your Forest. Hope this helps! :)

scraped_reviews.content: It's really useful as I can use any tree and keeps me motivated to do my tasks. It's really peaceful app for people that just need to get off their phones. Not to mention that choice is yours on what to do. So I am grateful for that On there other hand, most of the extra stuff is behind a pay wall. As well as most trees, audios, and such as other stuff. Not to mention, it's only two hours and I wish it had more than that. But other than that, it is a good app for a timer and rest.

I love the app. The functionality is amazing. It keeps me off of time-wasting apps. My review is more about the events. For the events to be included is indeed fun. But the time sensitive nature of them makes me want to rip out my hair and delete the app. I've used Forest for about 6 years and have missed EVERY birthday item because their free collection period for the events are generally about 4 days. It really ruins the fun of it when you're actually busy irl (summer) and don't check the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for the feedback. Every exclusive tree is once free to unlock for a few days. We made sure that users can be notified in the app as well as across the social media so that they won't miss the redemption. If you're interested, you may consider unlocking exclusive trees with Time Crystals. Thanks for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, I have loved to use this whenever I'm unconsciously procrastinating. It gives you stats on how many trees you've grown, how many you've killed, and how many minutes you've focused in days, weeks, months, and years. My only issue is recently a glitch has surfaced. It says I can not play the ad to double my coins, which really sucks because I want cuter trees.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

This usually means the advertising platform does not have any ads available at the time. 
You will need to try again later. :) - Forest

scraped_reviews.content: I recommend this app to all of my friends for studying! In addition to the focus help, it motivates me to get more done and to challenge myself in new ways! I especially like seeing a whole forest for a day, month, etc. Sadly, there was no way to transfer my plants when I got a new phone, so I am having to unlock plants again.

Been using this for years! Love the simpleness and the alone time with it. I don't have intention join friends or groups. However, there are some things I hope it can improve: - Another way to earn crystals plz Mine still stays at 30 since the beginning. - Birthday events were too short to catch the prizes. When I clicked on the link, it was no longer available. The US timeline was inconvenient for me. - more new trees and sounds. Seems like the developers have been slow down recently.

Very helpful when studying or when you just want time off your phone! im horrible when it comes to doing homework or dedicating time to read, but with this app (and the sounds you can unlock so it isnt super quiet and awkward) ive managed to be more involved with my school work and im halfway through a book! you can customize what trees show up in your forest the more you focus, and can help the process of planting more trees. i really love this app :^)

I really like this app. It helps me stay away from my phone while I study. It lets me grow cute trees ðŸ˜ I got the Pro version to let me create/join groups and it definitely helps me to be more accountable because if I leave, everyone else's tree dies too. There's also a whitelist feature that allows me to choose certain apps that i=I can use while on in a group. initially, I thought that the 'multiplier' function was gone when I got the Pro version, but I found that I could turn it on in the settings. And I think the best feature is that I get to grow real trees too! Super recommend the app!

After 3 years I'm trying this app again & find that it is so much better. Seems the devs added features I had wanted, like now your forest keeps building up, each day addong to it. It really is a fun way to force myself to focus. For me, simply setting apps that limit the time I other apps is not really effective nor does it help me keep on track. Forest, however makes me WANT to stay focused so I can build up my forest! If you enjoy games like Animal Crossing, I think this will be up your alley

I want it to count up infinitely not down based on rounded chunks of time like 25 minutes, 10 minutes, etc. I want to both keep myself from minimizing the app to get on other apps AND just count the minutes I successfully did so for each work day. But with this, if I don't complete the entire 25 minutes, then the 23 minutes and change I completed just doesn't get counted, and even if I do complete the 25 minutes, I might forget to plant again for another 40 minutes, then those 40 minutes of productivity don't get counted. I wish it just had something like a stopwatch mode, and then for every 10 minute mark it gives me a plant, but it tracked every single minute I went without getting on another app regardless of whether I met discrete chunks of time or not. Need it to work without me constantly replanting, because remembering to replant is another form of time-wasting. Need it to track all the time I have it running in toto. I love the idea, just wish it had options for the mode it does now and the mode I'm talking about.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
Thanks for the feedback. Currently, the focus time in Forest could only be adjusted by 5 minutes a set. However, there is an option in settings called "count exceeded time" which might fit your case! Please try out to see if it helps!  Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions or suggestions! :) Forest

scraped_reviews.content: amazing app. very simple, easy to use interface. extremely helpful when you need to focus. the only thing that would be great is if tree type that you purchase had separate stats or features. for example, if tree 1 provides a better coin amount or a compound effect, plant X amount of same trees and it gets stronger and gives you more coins.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the app so far, but it's impossible to sign up for pro. I keep trying. First it says it timed out, then it freezes, then it says I'll lose all my entries so far due to an existing account, but I can't find that account. Also, there needs to be a way to just enter a birthdate instead of having to scroll through 12 months per year -over 240 swipes for a 20 year old.

I like how simple this game is! It's easy to use, the graphics are cute and I'm prevented from using my phone whenever I grow a tree. I would prefer, however, if there were more variety in the plants since you get used to all of them after a while. Also, a lot of the other features like the achievements and such are limited for f2p players so that was a little disappointing. But other than that, it serves its purpose well!

Do you wish you were more productive with your down time? I have the Pro version so I can plant trees, unlock achievements, and track how I use my free time. I love the ability to "whitelist" apps like music so I can jam while I do my chores or drive places. I have my tags listed with things I want to do more of like dance moves, doing a workout, or spending a reasonable time gaming before I do something else. Plus it helps me focus on the stuff I don't wanna do like paperwork but with plants!

I was really enjoying the free version, there were actually some really cute plants. I debated going to the paid version but it was only $2 so I finally did it and since I was changing phones I figured why not. THEN when I tried to sign in on my other device it wouldn't let me even when I signed out of my other emails like it suggested. So it charged me $2 more to sign back in!! Ridiculous!!!! Fix this!!! 9/13/20 I was charged again for logging in on a different device!

Since I don't have "pro version" all the tress I had unlocked were refund and I lost all of them. The only ones I have are the free version trees. I am very upset and disappointed in changes. scraped_reviews.content: Forest is incredible! If you're like me and feel motivated by both the concreteness of a timer and cozy woodland art, you might love this app as well. It's part of my daily work routine and helps me avoid getting sucked into my phone. You can earn coins for focus time and save them up to buy new tree/flower types, so there's a little sense of progress there as well. It's beautifully simple and effective.

Thee planting reminders aren't working for me for some reason. I have them set and on, but I don't get notifications. Also, my trees don't wither when I go into an app that's not on my whitelist. They have an advanced detection mode, but sorry, I don't want Forest to be able to collect data on what I'm typing (it includes everything but passwords, even credit card numbers)

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app so much, it helps me stay focused and is cute and visually appealing. I had one problem. The trees that you grow change their looks the longer u can stay focused. But it's like it requires u to stay focused the whole 120 minutes before u can grow your tree to it's full capacity. Considering this is listed as a pomodoro app I'd have thought that you can add breaks every 25 minutes. It's really sad and dettering. I wish it had breaks u can adjust it to.

Great way to focus! I love that you can set allow lists for certain apps! Edit: I reached the five tree limit, and although I understand why it exists, I do wish you could plant more the longer you have had the app installed, or could buy more at a higher price. I don't know if that would be possible, but I wanted to put the suggestion out there. Still an excellent app!

It really helps! This simple app helps me keep on track. 4 stars because you can't change the amount of time for each tree. ETA: I've found a workaround. You can select "Counting exceeded time" in Settings. That way the time recorded is the actual time you stay focused, not the default 25 minutes.

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy using this app. Not only is it user friendly, the creative types of plants you can unlock add another incentive to being productive. it's quite effective. my only real issues with the app is that 1) the prices go up as you unlock more things, and 2) the trees and bushes cost the same amount to unlock but do not give you the same amount of coins in return. Trees and bushes should obviously be differently priced.

Currently, the first tree species purchase will cost 500 coins. Every additional tree species purchase will increase the cost by 100 coins, with the limit set at 1000 coins. We kindly ask for your understanding and we will further improve Forest overtime! Feel free to contact us via in-app feedback system if you have further questions. :)

scraped_reviews.content: Over the years, I've experimented with a lot of different productivity apps, but Forest:Stay Focused is the only one that I've continued using. The incentive to grow beautiful and creative trees really does encourage me to focus on my work. I love that new tree and plant species are added all of the time. I do wish that there were more ambient noises to unlock and more badges to earn. Otherwise, I am very satisfied with this app and think that it is worth the money.

This is a great app with misleading/unethical privacy problems. I paid for the full version expecting to be able to use the full version, but I can't use the features without giving my personal information (name, email, birthday). I tried to add my birthday to sign up, even though I'm really not happy with the privacy and data collection, but you tap several hundred times to get to the right year (for example, if you are 32, you have lived 384 months, and you have to tap through all of it).

This is one of the best apps I've ever downloaded and purchased. Great idea, with an adorable presentation. They lock custom labels for your growing sessions behind a pay-wall, but so many other great things are unlocked that it's well-worth the $2. Their other app, "Sleep Town," is also adorable and the same price for great features. I use both apps on a regular basis and highly recommend them.

With the set of new updates, the app has become inconvenient. It doesn't notify you when the time is up, and they made all trees except the originals available only to those who get the paid version and randomly increased the prices of certain trees. Today, I lost all of my purchased trees in the app from the past 3-4 years. I do not want a refund in coins, I want my refund in trees. Purchasing new trees with coins from remaining focus was the point of this app. Very disappointed

Some tree species will be classified as professional tree species and cannot be planted. scraped_reviews.content: Ever since the update to at a Whitelist to allow me to use my phone apps such as Google Docs , Notepad, Duolingo, etc. It's been a lot more wonderful of an experience as someone who doesn't always have access to a laptop/computer for homework. Love planting real trees but I do love the updates that come with more variety of our own forests so that I can have weekly themes. Can't wait to see more flowers as well, my suggestion is a colorful bunch of Lilies! Honeysuckles would be adorable too.

I bought the premium version which enables me to tailor the app to my needs, such as unique tags for my time spent, different types of trees, etc. Most importantly, after I have collected 2500 coins I can plant a tree. FISHY: When you plant a tree there is no notification or updates that you get to prove that a tree was actually planted. Instead, the total number of trees goes up by 1. This is sketchy because I have no idea if this app is really doing what it said.

I love this app!! It's so helpful if you get either the free version or pro version. It's helped a lot with my studies in college and keeping track of everything. However, with its last update, my app seems to be glitching a lot. First I couldn't open the app and now I can't properly sign in to my account. I want to open a room with my friend but it keeps saying that I'm not signed in and I can't seem to access it all properly.

This is the 1st app I've ever spent money on. It's really cute and has helped organize my life a little. I've found myself intentionally doing productive tasks in order to add trees to my forest. I wish there were more plants though. I love to garden in real life and there are so many beautiful trees I'd love to incorporate in my virtual forest that the app doesn't have. It only has the default pine tree, but has no redwoods, sequoias, junipers, or firs, which is a shame. Conifers are cool af.

This may be because I've only tried the free version, but it does not prevent me from using literally anything else. If I use the back arrow directly out of the app, it will prompt the "do you want to leave/kill your tree?", but if I use the home button to navigate away, or use any of my notifications to navigate away, there is no prompt and my tree still grows even though I'm not being productive/playing on my phone. Kinda defeats the purpose unfortunately..
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We are really sorry for the inconvenience. Some Android devices could not operate efficiently with Forest.
Could you follow the instructions in the link below and see if it helps?
https://forestapp.cc/faq/whitelist_notification/

If the issue remains, please send the details of the problem to android.support@forestapp.cc.
-Forest

scraped_reviews.content: I started using this app to help with Grad School reading. So far I really like it, I've been able to start working at regular intervals again despite feeling stressed. It helps me stay off my phone and shows me how much progress I've made during the week, even when I feel like I've accomplished very little. My only issue so far is that I can't access the focus challenges. Trying to open them in the app crashes it immediately. Other sections like friends and achievements also load very slowly.

title: Photo Lab Picture Editor & Art
description:
Join AI photo editor Photo Lab which allows you to edit photos with face filters for pictures, stylish photo effects and lots of pic art ideas. Fantastic face photo montage maker, photo frames, picture effects and filters are here for you to enjoy.

Neural Photo Art Styles

A new smart and quick way to turn any photo into an artwork â€” choose from over 50 pre-set styles and experience advanced photo editing with the emergence of ai photo styles.

Photo frames

Whether you're aiming to accentuate a beloved memory or seeking to add a polished finish to your photo, our diverse collection of exquisite photo frames provides the ideal solution. Just choose one of our beautiful frames and add a final touch to your favorite picture.

Realistic photo effects

This photo editor offers a range of captivating photo effects that can transform ordinary images into extraordinary visual creations. By applying these effects, you can add depth and character to your photos, turning simple snapshots into stunning works of art.

Face photo montages

Swap face easily and turn yourself or your friend into a cartoon character, a doll or any other look. The most complicated photo montages are handled automatically by a face detection algorithm to create the most unusual selfies.

Photo background editor

Use this advanced picture editor to easily and quickly erase and change backgrounds of your selfie with many creative background templates.

Photo filters

You don't need a pro photo editor to add some style to your images. Use various photo filters such as 3d photo, cartoon, vintage, anime, black&white, oil painting and many more to create different moods and atmospheres in your photos.

Photo collages

Create a wonderful pic collage. Seamlessly combine multiple images to craft captivating visual narratives that tell a story beyond a single frame.

Make your image look creative in seconds without using a professional picture editor and set it as a profile pic, share it to any social network or send a signed virtual postcard to friends.

Please note that Photo Lab is an Internet-based application. It helps us keep your devices' memory free from tons of resources required to create high-quality artworks of your photos.

Photo Lab as an ai photo editor offers everything you want to enhance your photo and add originality to your selfie. Bring your creativity to life and edit photos with our face filters and stylish photo effects.

Linerock Investments LTD acts as the data controller for all data collected and subsequently processed during your access and use of this App. The App Developer ensures the distribution of the app on Google Play. This is manifestly declared in the Privacy Policy for this App.
