summary: Edit photos with the picture generator: PS2 & AI Clay filters, cartoon effects.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used the app for a few years with great results! NOW when I use it, it will start 'processing', but as soon as I tap to 'save' it, the message "Photo Not Found" "Make Sure Photo is Saved on Device" pops up & it reverts back to my original photo! All my photos are saved on my device! Very disappointing! Will have to delete app since it won't work for me.

I found this app a few months ago & I loved it...you had to watch a few ads but I was fine with that because a lot of the photos generated were really cool! And I really like all the filters & effects available for editing! But a couple of weeks ago, the app started crashing CONSTANTLY!! I tried reinstalling it and then using it during off-times - still crashes within the first minute of opening. It's a shame because I really enjoyed this app, but I'm probably going to uninstall it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry to hear youâ€™ve been experiencing some crash issues. Please contact us at support@pho.to and share as much information as you can. We will definitely investigate your case. Thank you for posting!

scraped_reviews.content: It offered 3 free days, and THEN I would be charged the 7.99. It's a crock of ðŸ’©. I was immediately charged. Update; It seems we need to look at what "trial period" means because that does not mean you pay for any subscription. You do a trial run to see if you like it and am interested in paying. It's the equivalent of a test drive but an app instead. I've done many 3 free trial days, and not one charged me prior to those days. Maybe change your wording of the offer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, please note, that any trial period is a part of a subscription, so Googleâ€™s payment system requires to link a payment method even if you sign up for a trial. You can also contact us at support@pho.to and we will check the subscription status.

scraped_reviews.content: Since they added AI it sucks. Nothing looks like me. I have the paid version and will not be renewing. Maybe they need an icon that shows the Ai ones and seperates them from the others. I'm highly disappointed in this app now and I used to LOVE it. I liked being able to search categories like "patriotic" art effects, etc. too. now that it gone. may not renew.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, thank you for taking the time to review the app and sharing your thoughts with us. We will take it into consideration.

scraped_reviews.content: well they've ruined it completely. Can no longer recommend. it used to give options to colorized and even do repairs of photos. you could also request things like backgrounds and such. they have eliminated all of that. they evrn eliminated the ability to mark favorites. now nearly the entire app just puts a face in an AI picture. doesn't let you edit your own photo. Very Disappointing ðŸ˜ž
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support@pho.to.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using Photo Lab for years now, I love it! It lets me easily create stunning images with several different effects. I love that it auto-applies effects, saving me the painstaking time it takes to properly mask photos. Although, it does have the option to adjust the auto-mask when necessary. My only complaints are 1) I wish there were more options to include pets. 2) Need guidelines for import sizing on photos as I often have to crop mine. 3) Some effects require a face, but shouldn't.

I love this app, and I use the free version. If it was a necessity, say for my work, I'd absolutely use the paid version. And when I'm able to afford more than just survival, this is an app I would definitely splurge on. Still, the free version totally rocks. If you have even a slight interest in playing around with and altering photos, you'll end spending hours creating so many different images. And the fact that I've never had to contact support is impressive.

The membership price isn't worth it!!! Why? It's just frustrating when in the Looklab, dream look and dream manifestor generator you create your own AI and get some strange results. Ie, more than half of the results are not of you. You also get results where you have a missing limb, an object placed in random places where they don't belong or even more frustrating, some results have you paired up with some random model in the photo when you didn't ask for one. Annoooying!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for taking the time to review our app and sharing thoughts with us. Unfortunately Artificial Intelligence that is involved in most effects is not perfect and has just started how to draw correctly. Nevertheless, we are open to new ideas and user experience is our priority. You can always e-mail us at support@pho.to

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not one for writing reviewers unless it's REALLY bad or really good. This app is really good in terms you have it seems unlimited template options, some repetitive tho. it would be nice to be able favorite a template without having to create an account. I have enough accounts in my life, I really don't want to have to create one just to save a picture template. Save the location link to my phone, keep it simple. Good app tho, I recommend it... and I don't do that often.

This app enables you to do in minutes, what it would take a Photoshop expert hours to do. And you don't have to know Photoshop. The effects are creative, stunning, funny, crazy, and fun. I spent several hours playing with it. I would have given it a 5 except for 2 reasons. 1) It is often hard to navigate back to an effect that you like because you can't find it. There are different categories of effects and then tabs for "Top" "Trending" and "Recent." For example, I liked the animated sunshine

Awesome app for editing pics, especially if your one that has a eye for detail and design. I use this app and PhotoFox as well and they both have a lot of options and a lot of different characterists for each app separately. Basically for the few things I may not be able to use in the one, I can use in the other one. Which in combination it gives you great potential and concepts for detailing your photos, and editing plenty of other designs, posts, memes, and more. I would definitely recommend.

This is a pretty fun app. I don't know why there are reviews saying there are a lot of ads, because I didn't get any pop-up or invasive ads. Just a quiet photo type ad while the pictures were processing. I didn't feel annoyed by them at all. Plenty (actually many) options available without going pro. I look forward to seeing what else I can create with this app.

There are so many ads that you end up on shein. Everything is vip, so you have to have a premium. occasionally, you can make a photo after two or three ads if you don't get stuck in another app. I really wanted some downtime playing with hair colors, body styles , dark fantasy background, ect, but it's impossible with this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you better user experience. Could you give us the screenshots of Ads that disturb you most? You can email us at support@pho.to.

scraped_reviews.content: It's really fun playing with the different concepts and styles for my pics....People love how I've changed their pic from plain to awesome. So many options to do.....Loving it. The sharing feature is also a big plus. Share right after your edits. Big plus! At first, I was frustrated with the ad so I clocked to purchase...it was only $9 for the year! For gorgeous photos! A score for me!

Has some cool editing features to manipulate your pictures. The free version has tons of annoying ads, and some features don't work unless you pay for the subscription. Even after going pro, I still can't use certain features; they require a computer and other apps. Wish I could sort the templates and file my favorites. It looks like there is this option, but maybe only for the ones you create... wish there was a more in depth guide to that. Scrolling through the combos is tedious and they get repetitive. Also there is very limited options for manipulating your orginal picture. For example I have to exit the app to crop other than a preset box. Need the option to manually choose a focus for the picture, to place pictures off center, to apply to select areas etc. Not a bad beginner's app, but has a great deal of room for improvements.

Has great overlays and backgrounds. Can't edit lighting and the photo by itself; you have to choose from premade filters however they have a wide variety of them to choose from and you're able to edit those, add text, etc. It also works very quickly. The ads pop up while you're pics are processing so they don't disrupt you. Overall I'd rate it a 5 star AP, esp by comparison to the other free app that I've tried.

Freakin amazing! One of the coolest apps out there for photo-manipulation on Android! The one thing I would like is for there to be more options to give it your own unique spin by being able to play more with the saturation, light, color, sharpness, etc as well as possibly mixing their default filters together. Who knows, tho? Maybe once I explore a little more I'll find that it does, in fact, have these options and I'll come back and change my rating to 5 stars!

I hate the ad system they are using. I don't want a subscription service. I don't mind paying for ad free, but I also am not paying $5 a month for something I might use once or twice. It takes FOREVER to apply any of its effects, and if you don't have an ad free version you are watching an ad while it is doing it. A scaled down, ad free, NON-SUBSCRIPTION version might be okay, but this is clunky and hard to use. The filter and effects are numerous and look fun, but it is way too hard to actually use them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,
while we are glad you appreciated the number of effects in our app, we are sorry you were disappointed withother things. If you have any suggestions for us to improve, please let us know.

scraped_reviews.content: I'd give 3.5 stars if I could but it's not an option. Aside a few nuances (which I get), the app is a lot of fun. I took off points for the In your face ads and the subscription thing. I might be inclined to pay a small 1 time fee but the app is a bit gimmicky. It seems that an awful lot of work went into creating this app and I would imagine much more will go into it. I just can't see myself using it more than a few times before I get tired of the fun.

Ads for days! I get it's free, but there's a point to the number of ads. Everytime you tap something, an ad. I want to buy it, but just for being barraged with so many in the free, I won't buy. Tone it down. REPLY TO AUTHORS REPLY. I get you need to pay for your time, but you set a bad tone when I have to watch a 30 second add and click through 4 more just to get a photo. Still, TOO MANY ADS.. Makes me not want to buy it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,
we are sorry for this, but to continue work on this Free app and keep it up to date we need some money that we get only from the Ads inside the app. If you don't want to see the Ads you can purchase PRO version. Hope for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: Updated ! This app was a great application! Now, I have an upgraded membership that I can't take off,and this application has had numerous problems? Bugs ? I am always having to uninstall it and then reinstall it. Keep getting a message that says this about the constant freezing of the application! Just fix it! You are ripping me off, and I would uninstall this forever, but I am paying for the subscription. I just found out how to cancel my subscription! I'm not happy! Have emailed support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we would like to fix this. As we don't have your email address, can you please write to us at support@pho.to so that we can help you better. We look forward to your email.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for many years, it's by far the best photo editor for fun edits. Until recently, the biggest flaw was that I wish the face detection picked up pet faces (we use it a lot to make goofy photos of our dogs). But today I discovered they now have a whole section of edits specifically for animals!!! There are endless neat options without having to pay for Pro. Great little app.

Initially, I didn't like this app because it isn't intuitive and all the photo options appear as a randomly mixed menagerie of unusual things. Some artists put their names on their design when they aren't famous, nor do you know them, but eventually I figured out I could "X" the name off before saving my piece. The app lacks good organization to find options & leaves off any control to move photo to fit best, instead opting for a preâ€¢crop or sizing. Click out & you'll never find 'that one' again.

There is a 3 day free trial period before being charged for a premium account. I could not use the app without a premium account, so I signed up for the 3 day free trial. The app was so slow, and the interface not the least user friendly, so I cancelled the subscription. Despite a trial subscription that lasted all of 15 minutes, I was charged 7.99 plus tax for a week. Now I have to appeal this charge to Google and it is a bother.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
We apologize for this experience. We would need to speak with you to better understand the problem you encountered. Please contact us at support@pho.to so we can help resolve this issue. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to really love this ap, but I just signed back on and within 30 mins, I'm ready to unsubscribe. Don't have time to deal with it because every time I try to create an effect on a pic it tells me, " Oops! A face has not been detected" and I'm the only one in the shot! After trying 3 photos with the same, "Oops!......... I've determined that I guess my pics arent good enough for your app anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Tena, in order to avoid 'Face not detected' error please use straight on portraits without hair or sunglasses over the face. Besides, could you please send us the photo which fails to process at support@pho.to so we can investigate the issue?

scraped_reviews.content: I like a lot of the filters and overlays. The only issue I have is I wish it was more manageable and allowed me to manipulate it myself rather then auto generate the finished product. I would have loved to had complete control over lighting, positioning, contrast, coverage etc. Otherwise then feeling like it's a sort of hit or miss with some photos, I do like this app a lot.

I was only able to use the app one time before it started messing up. -_- When I tried to use it again the app refuses to even open for me so I had to get rid of it. Also, I don't like your "Photo Lab" logo popping up on my photos. The preview photos don't show a "Photo Lab" logo, but mine did. Sorry, but that's an eyesore to see, especially when I use my pics as profile pics. ðŸ‘ŽIt's a shame 'cause it looked cool.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,
please try clearing cache and reinstalling the app. It may solve the problem with opening. 
Only PRO version does not watermark images and is ad-free.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to absolutely love this app. The changes are horrible. Way too many ads, can't turn off the audio permanently, and the way the categories are organized is different. I mean how many people actually purchase stuff through ads on these apps installed through the Play store? With the amount of hackers out there? The majority of the filters are "pro" which you must pay for. Many of the filters have just way too much going on. What happened to simple but elegant or classy? Uninstalled!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, sorry to hear you are unsatisfied with the progress of the updates. The app is free and there are more free filters than paid. You can use the free version if you don't like to be subscribed. We hope you can enjoy our app again in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: The results were more than disappointing. When I used the cartoon filter, the contrast between the dark and the light colors completely ruined the picture. I uninstalled this app very quick. To do most of the things, you are required to 'go pro' so if you don't want to get money involved, this isn't the app to use. Overall, the app has some good filters and is fine if you are ok with wasting money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,
please e-mail us at support@pho.to and attach pictures before and after editing so we could deal with it more effectively. We will do our best to help you out.

scraped_reviews.content: I love that you can look at what others are doing & quickly try out everything they've done. The selection of filters & effects are interesting & always expanding. My biggest problem with the app is there's no way to edit any of the effects. You can't fade or intensify a filter, touch up the edges of a background or make sure that crazy hair color covers every strand, nor can you adjust a headpiece to fit correctly. You're stuck with what it gives you & it ruins a lot effects.

So so cartoon face. Ads are over the top and extremely annoying. The app could be simple and small but it's bloated with ads. I would not pay a wooden nickel for this if every ad was removed. About as much fun as car warranty calls. "Contains ads"! Ha! The app is just ads. I understand you need dinero to fiddle with the app. If I like an app I will pay for it. You have done a remarkable job of saturating your app with ads. I had to uninstall the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, we are sorry for this, but to continue work on this Free app and keep it up to date we need some money that we get only from the Ads inside the app. If you don't want to see the Ads you can purchase PRO version. Hope for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love this app! It provides so many options in the free version with the option to watch ads to remove the watermark from your your pic and so much more! I enjoyed the free version so much I went ahead and paid for the ad free version. That opened the door to the ultimate picture editing/creating experience! So many more options became available and even after months of having the upgraded version, I haven't run out of creative things to do to my pics! I love it! Thank u developers!

I just started using and love it so far! So much fun. However, I will process some I really like, but then it will not download and save to my device. It says error: null. This happens a lot. I also wish I had more control of the edit...maybe an erase brush to erase a part of the photo. Ig: leaves on photo, but erase the one that covers the face. Also, when there are two faces to be able to choose which face to apply the effect. But it is great for fast fun edits!

Paid subscription, now can't quit it. Pretty irritating. ********************* Dear Linerock Investments, I HAD a paid monthly subscription that I was asking about if you had read it correctly. ðŸ™‚ I was able to put my subscription on hold until October. I received an email with a receipt for my most current payment. It had a link that I used. Otherwise I don't think I would have ever found where to put on hold.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, thank you for your feedback. The subscription is optional and lasts only three days. You can close the banner on the start via the "Back" native button and continue using Photo Lab for free without access to the PRO features.

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE this app. It's a lot of fun and the photos look very realistic most of the time. The free version gives you a ton of options. It's worth the download. I do however hope the dream manifestor gets better about following your description. Right now it doesn't create a close representation of what you describe to it. Other than that please continue with the awesome styles.

Isn't an image editing app, it's basically a selfie hub that might have image editing software if you give them money. Nothing wrong with charging money for your app, but don't pose the "free" version as something along the lines of the same type of application if you can't even try out basic features of editing and post it behind a paywall. It just wastes time and guarantees I won't buy your product.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,
we are sorry to hear that you didn't like our app. We are constantly working on improving Photo Lab and if you have any suggestions, please let us know.

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent app with tons of options for effects, adding text, combining filters/effects, etc. This makes photo editing a breeze! Also with the paid subscription,(which I have) there are NO annoying adds ! Oh yah, also you can create your own combination of AI movement, filters, etc. and share it with other subscribers!!! All in all a great app!!! It's well worth the lifetime subscription!!

this App is absolutely amazing... if you need an easy to use, mobile-based and simple but potential for complexoties, This Is The One!!! Oh yeah... and did I mention it's all free..? You CAN upgrade (which I AM DOING next week) and get even MORE AWESOME OPTIONS, but ya really don't NEED TO... I use this for music performances and promotional stuff so.... the skies the limit!

From what I can tell, the edits could be lovely if I only could get it to work on my phone. I'm in an endless loop having to do with overlays and settings...but no specific directions on what to do. I turn off overlays for everything and it still doesn't workâ˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†update! it works fantastic. just wish options would load faster. great app.

The first & only image I created was just basic without digging into all of the features. It looked great,really nice, but it wasn't what I was looking for. I want't to cancel before the 3 day trial ends, but there's no option to do so. I emailed the developer. I'm still waiting on a reply. I will edit my review on the resolution of this.

I thought this was going to be an easy app to photo edit. I just wanted to choose the picture I searched for then edit with what they had. Instead they take thorough different ads. I understand that. Unless you pay monthly fee. No ads. Then they take you to Facebook then other people pics what they done. I just wanted to get to my photo and do edits.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, we are sorry to hear that you didn't like our app. If you have any suggestions for us to improve, please let us know.

scraped_reviews.content: just now started using it, but so far so good. turns my photos into another photo but with a beautiful filter! you have the option to save the photo, &/or share it on insta. slightly annoying the ads, BUT it doesn't take long and in my opinion, worth it to get the results bc they are pretty, they did a good job. another slight draw back is it can take up to 5 seconds to "process" the photo after applying the desired filter, AFTER watching the dumb ad. but all in all, great app tho, does its job.

This is Voice Actor, Icemin Lee! The Photo Lab, makes it easy to find just the right template to excercise your more creative side! Although, for a hassle free experience and a small fee, I would definitely upgrade to "Pro"! I'm niether endorsing nor am I being paid to offer my opinion based off my personal use of this app! to hear my voice, simply type in my first name "Icemin" in the search field on YouTube! And listen to "Myths and Fables"! or "AllState"! Thank You!

This app is positively brilliant. The possibilities are endless from even a template perspective. Add in the ability to build on, change and expand a template or combination of templates to your heart's desire you have an infinity of effects, frames, and edits at your fingertips! And a simple ad view unlocks hundreds of effects on a single use basis. YOU CAN'T LOSE! I suspect you'll pay for Pro as I did. The value is too over!

Edit to say... It's 2020, and I still love it! Love it! Lots of choices, and they insert your face better than any other app I've used... Being able to add animations and other stuff to the images makes it very versatile.... a whole lot of different combinations. It's fun and easy! I only wish there were more templates. ðŸ˜‰

FIVE STARS, especially for free, but I upgraded to PRO a long time ago. I've used it for years now, and it has always delivered great and "LOTS OF FUN" photos. It is my "go to app" when I am stuck somewhere, just WAITING! My kids love for me to take their ordinary pictures, and making them look funny, strange, or absolutely beautiful! I would recommend this app for everyone who likes to take photos and enhance them! Think of it as a huge amount of amusement, for FREE!

The app has intrusive ads, & saved work is watermarked. It has many effects, plus email support. Even more effects are available & no ads for those willing to pay the $ubscription price. Two new features were added & are available in the free version, Block Combo and Block User. Warning! The developers "Omitted" the Unblock option for both. Once these are used, it can't be undone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, we are sorry for this, but to continue work on this Free app and keep it up to date we need some money that we get only from the Ads inside the app. If you don't want to see the Ads you can purchase PRO version. Hope for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: I have used both the Pro version and the Free version. Both were great until s short while back. When I open the app, the choice to buy the Pro version pops up on the screen. It will not let me skip this and go into the free version! So then I tried to sign up for the 3-day trial. Then all I got was a lot of grief about a new password that I tried to install. I uninstalled and reinstalled. I'm just going in a vicious circle!! SO aggravating!! Can someone PLEASE help me??
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
We apologize for this experience. We would need to speak with you to better understand the problem you encountered. Please contact us at support@pho.to so we can help resolve this issue. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: 3 stars because the effects are well done and fun to explore, but the app is annoying unless you're going to pay for it. Too many adds, logos that place themselves in terrible places on your photo and don't allow you to change their position, more adds, effects you can't use without premium. They do their absolute best to force you to pay.

This app has actually encouraged me to take more pictures, so that I have more pictures to edit. I think I might be letting my child's life go by without the push of being able to play with them. I mostly edit pictures of my daughter, and I find it entertaining and relaxing. I generally work in the confines of free (which has tons of beautiful options), but sometimes, it will let you do pro stuff by watching an ad (I can live with that).

title: Toy Blast
description: Welcome to Toy Blast, the funniest puzzle game ever! Jump into the Toy world and help Amy through her adventurous journey. Blast the cubes and combine powerful boosters to beat the challenging levels. Join tournaments and events to compete with players all around the world! Everything you dreamed of is at your fingertips, with the most exciting puzzles you will ever see! Once you play the colorful puzzles of Toy Blast, you will never look for anything else! TOY BLAST FEATURES: â— Unique and exciting match-3 levels: fun boards featuring boosters and combos! â— Hilarious episodes: discover all the adventures with Amy and her fantastic friends! â— Fun events every day: Cube Party, Star Tournament, Team Adventure, Crown Rush, Rotor Party and Team Race! â— Complete the daily challenges of Hoop Shot and win magnificent rewards! â— Create your team and join the tournaments to get boosters and unlimited lives! â— Compete with the best players in Legends Arena to get the grand prize!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Toy Blast, the funniest puzzle game ever!

Jump into the Toy world and help Amy through her adventurous journey. Blast the cubes and combine powerful boosters to beat the challenging levels. Join tournaments and events to compete with players all around the world!

Everything you dreamed of is at your fingertips, with the most exciting puzzles you will ever see!

Once you play the colorful puzzles of Toy Blast, you will never look for anything else!

TOY BLAST FEATURES:

â— Unique and exciting match-3 levels: fun boards featuring boosters and combos!
â— Hilarious episodes: discover all the adventures with Amy and her fantastic friends!
â— Fun events every day: Cube Party, Star Tournament, Team Adventure, Crown Rush, Rotor Party and Team Race!
â— Complete the daily challenges of Hoop Shot and win magnificent rewards!
â— Create your team and join the tournaments to get boosters and unlimited lives!
â— Compete with the best players in Legends Arena to get the grand prize!
summary: The ultimate matching puzzle game with unique gameplay!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a good game in the beginning, but at higher levels it can take lots of tries to win (I've spent at least a half hour trying to win a level). The game appears random, but it can give you set ups that are not possible to win, and then after multiple attempts, it will give you better tiles. But given only 5 lives, you can burn thru a lot of coins, boosters and helpers. What was once a fun and relaxing game, has become incredibly annoying
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you feel this way. Our game is designed with a computer algorithm. The mechanism of the game works through this algorithm, and the cubes are determined randomly by the choice of this mechanism. If you need any further help, you can always contact us by using the "Support" button in our game.

scraped_reviews.content: I made a purchase on 4th September 2024. I didn't get what I purchased. After finishing the first 5 games each time you're given an opportunity to get to watch ads and gain 5 additional moves. That dissapeared. It use to give you #10 additional games to play once you've played the game... you have to watch an ad to receive the #10 games with an ad showing between each. That's gone. If you dont purchase coins, you'll need to wait until the next day to play the #5 free games. Not worth it.

I have been playing this game for a few years now, and usually I enjoy it (although you can tell it's rigged to let you or to not let you win sometimes). However, the recent updates have annoyed me. You used to get 5 moves if you watched 3 ads - now that's gone. Also, it used to let you watch an ad to get an extra life when you ran out - that's gone, too! Basically, now they force you to use up your boosters. Overall it's still a fun game, but those little changes are irritating.

Cute & fun. I really like the design of this game. Boosters are neither too easy or to hard to earn. No ads to continue to next level. My one complaint is that to earn extra moves at the end, sometimes there's an option to watch ads; many times I'll miss the tiny x and it'll take me out to the so store and once I hit back, the whole game reloads â˜¹ï¸ <---- got a new phone and that doesn't happen anymore ðŸ™‚

The "intentional freezing" is insane. It never happens before you get the "super bomb" but once you have it, and win too many levels consecutively, it freezes. Forcing you to do a hard close and it takes away the super bomb. Making you win 10 new levels to get it back. It's extremely frustrating and annoying. Would NEVER recommend this game to anyone!!

Impossible to win regularly without spending money on extras. It seemed like during the summer they loosened their algorithms so you could win games fairly. But now, I can play the same game 3 times and not win because it is impossible. I feel like they just took 5-7 moves off each game. It seems like everything happens in the game's favor. I started playing this game instead of candy crush because it seemed "fair". Now I don't want to spend any money because they have lost my trust.

It's very luck-based. Click two or more linked blocks, clear levels. You have to use the power ups to clear some levels. The game does give plenty of hearts, but it's definitely frustrating at some points. The Google play achievements require 3 stars on each level thru level 105. You sometimes can watch ads to get some more moves, but it's inconsistent when it's offered. Not a great game.

This game is not worth playing . I agree with other reviews about the levels not allowing to watch an ad to get more turns. It seems that this game is designed to burn through lives and suck in money to buy more . Also coins are too hard to win. I'll be unistalling this game as soon as I finish this review. it seems as if the creators don't care about the user here. The game becomes boring quickly.

I played this game for many years and was well over level 10000 and had played legends arena too many times to count. I had also spent quite a bit of money on it. They made it just too hard now to get past levels without boosts or spending money. It got to the point it was no fun anymore so I decided to uninstall it. My advice is have fun until it's too hard and NEVER spend a penny on it. That's what they want you to do. Dont fall for it

I used to love this game. no more. I have repeatedly brought up an issue to their support team. The scenario is I'm playing with the super TNT bonus, usually on Sky Path & run out of turns. in the past, i can watch an ad or pay 25 coins to continue. however, this glitch makes that pop up & app unusable. unable to watch ad, unable to pay 25 coins, unable to close the pop up. only way out is force close the app. I'm done with it. good luck! I've logged at least 4 cases over a month & still occurs.

I used to enjoy this game, but it is so ridiculously hard now it's insane. at the higher levels they will routinely give you maybe 18 or 19 moves to blast over 150 items. not even fun anymore. I've found I can struggle for days or even weeks for one level, then "magically" one day it will be simple and I'll solve it with 10 moves left. there is no randomness, the AI knows when you're about ready to uninstall then mysteriously it's simply solved. total garbage. UNINSTALLED

I used to like the game but made the mistake of making a purchase to pass a level. Ever since I did that, I no longer have the ability to watch ads to get extra moves. Customer service claims that watching ads was just something they were trying out, and it may be added or taken away from random accounts. I'm calling BS on that. I believe they took it away from my account because they figured I would keep making purchases. Total scam.

It is so so very sad to see what happened to this wonderful game! I have played it for years and you used to love it! Now, approximately every fifth time I watch an ad, it freezes up and I lose all my data ðŸ˜ž I have sent in my little complaint to the company many many times, they still haven't fixed this issue, it happened again today They offer a silly little reimbursement of getting some of the extras that I acquired back For the last year plus they have said they were going to fix this issue

I accidentally logged on to Facebook and I never did before and lost ALL my progress . Level 3671. Started over...now I'm on level 836.. I don't use Facebook. At all. Does this app work with Google Play PASS ? A discounted purchase would be GREAT. One more thing, the bonus spin should be DAILY ! (most games are) And to get it after progressing 100 levels ...the bonus is tiny and disappointing. Otherwise , I LOVE this game and my team.

There have been several times I've watched ads and do not receive the promised "additional moves". Your company is receiving compensation for my participation in watching these ads, in exchange for extra moves in the game. When you fail, on multiple occasions to complete your end of the agreement, you're in breach of contract. This forces me to constantly use in game coins that do have a cash value. I've also lost time, in addition to the time invested in gaining the coins in the game.

First of all, there are no cute animals or red headed ladies to rescue/crush here, so don't believe the ads. It's just a regular twist on a match 3 game, and you get to blow stuff up a lot. Which reminds me, I'm begging the developers to get rid of the fluffer voice telling me I did "Amazing!" and "Lovely!" every time I blow stuff up. Can we just have the game noises without the fluffer voice over? There are no in game ads, that part is true. The game play can be pretty difficult. Overall meh.

Lost 10 years worth of progress. I was in college when I first played this game and was pretty far. Anyways, I logged in using Facebook, I remember clearly because I could see what levels my friends were on. I had an iPhone at the time. I downloaded it today and logged in via FB only to see I'm back at level one. And it says I've been a member since today. I rather just not get disappointed any further. Not playing this.

Graphics and speed are good. Ads are too lengthy, too often. Designed so that you most likely have to sit through another adventure to gain a partial tube to help solve the puzzle. Also, the game brings you to the game download page. So, like having to make more clicks and ending up on the download page, causes the user to more likely download another game? Not likely, just aggravating.

This game is not fun anymore. Ive played it for years. Ive spent hundreds of dollars on this game as well. But now on every single level I have to spend coins to progress. When I stop spending coins I have to play a level so many times that I will have built 45 extra moves if I spend coins. I am disappointed in this game. Like I said ive been playing this game since it came out but the makers have made it impossible to progress.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having such difficulty in playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchase in the game. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a player for so long that I have to wait for you to build new levels. That being said, this new update is terrible. You've removed the ad watch option which was a life saver if you were only a few moves away from competing a level. It seems like the randomization of blocks has been adjusted to have the player lose more times than not. I'm not looking to win every time but it's almost impossible to get a streak rhythm going any more. Guess you're just after "in app purchases." Good job.

It's fun to play. I am hooked. Most importantly, there are no pesky ads. My only complaint is that at the higher levels of the game, the goals are much greater to achieve (such as the daily bonus, team goals, group goals, etc). However, the prizes for achieving the higher goals are not rewarded with higher prize levels or coins. Instead, the prizes are stagnant, just like the lower levels of the game. So basically, you move the goal post higher, and the points remain the same.

It's a fun game HOWEVER the rewards are difficult to get. Without spending money, it took 3 days to accumulate 25 coins which is what it takes to get 5 additional moves so I could continue the round. It would take a week to save enough credits for the train, vacuum, paint bucket and brush. It'd be nice to have more options especially when only one more more is needed. Don't developers want us to play their games? If I have to pay to continue playing, I move on to another game.

Been playing for over a year, up to the 9300 level, really enjoyed the game until a few days ago. Watching an ad to get 5 extra moves was a huge help finishing a level, that option is gone now. Used to get to watch an ad for another life but that is gone as well. Levels are set to where you can barely win unless you buy boosters. Uninstalled the game, the frustration isn't worth it.

The updates are hit or miss when they come which can be an issue but mostly, it's become a game that you will have to pay to advance. I've played it for several years and it's always been challenging but, it's clear with every update it's going towards being impossible to pass unless you pay money for helping items. I'm NOT going to pay money to play a game on my phone, so I'm OUT. It's been a fun game and would have kept it downloaded, but it's become obvious that you want people spending money
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you feel this way. Our goal is to provide you with the most fun puzzle game experience, and it is always possible to complete the levels without making any in-app purchases. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to contact us anytime by using the "Support" button in the "Settings" menu of the game.

scraped_reviews.content: Lies, lies, lies. They show you the game play to get you to DL it and then it turns out a totally different type of gameplay. Instead of rescuing the girl by popping cubes like the Ad for the game shows, it's just an ordinary popping the cubes and then what's really bad is that they give less and less moves that are needed to finish the puzzle, so you have to buy moves. And that's happening in less than 20 levels. Conniving and greedy developers. Don't bother if you want what the ad shows.

The first couple hundred levels are okay,but then you only get levels where you have to play 20 or 30 times, with only One move available for each turn. And no possible way to win. 30 or more turns of one, maybe two possible moves that use up your moves that get you nowhere- except losing. If you don't spend a crazy amount of money on extras, no way to pass the level and it Still takes playing levels over and over. Uninstalled.

Enjoyable....but now disappointed. I have been playing for years. I'm on the top level (10,201) now and have been for a long time. I liked how you got extra moves to keep playing a level by watching ads. I did that each morning until the ads run out, then I would use coins until I ran out them. But now, there isn't a option to watch ads for extra moves. I reckon I will move on and find a new game....

Forcing you to spend money. I have played this game for a long time. I am currently in 2nd place in a legends arena. I loved the game, still do, but don't like that you're making it impossible to get ahead unless you upgrade for $4.99. I will watch ads, but I think it sucks to take ads away from people who won't upgrade. I have played over 9000 levels, and told many friends to play. But I guess only money matters. I may have to delete this soon. There are plenty of free games to play!!

Had to change my rating because the latest update included a different way of continuing after running out of moves and I have wasted 25 coins 4 times now due to new format and it sucks! I hate it and hope they change it back! I am guessing that they won't and its an intentional way to get people to waste coins and spend more money on the game! It failed because I won't spend another dime as it currently exists!

If you're going to offer free moves from watching ads, take down the ads that crash the app and waste your time and resources. Lately it has become much worse and at least 75% of the time, the ad crashes the game, your progress lost, start the level over. Perhaps that's the point and intent... watch ads and get nothing in return. It's ridiculous.

I am so hooked on this game I already made it to the end. Now I go back and try to get 3 stars on lower levels. Doesn't take very long to wait for new levels. I have never purchased anything!!! If you want coins, then play the side games. Climb the treehouse. My coins really add up when I do that. Nevermind. They took away all the good side games. No more tree house. I still like the game but I am taking away 2 stars. I kept waiting for the games to come back. But they did not!

This game is exactly the same as their other game, toon blast, right down to the infuriating, impossible levels. Unless you spend money of course, but even then you pay more and get much less than any other game I have ever played. Greed is the clear motivation behind this game, and it's not fun at all anymore. They could make it challenging, great, but impossible until the 100th try, when it magically becomes easily passable, is why I'm done. There are better games that have players in mind.

It takes way to long to get new lives. I guess that's just the game developer trying to get people to spend money. Not gonna happen. They need to go back to the unlimited lives chests. The new ones suck. Also, the bee's are annoying. Since I wrote this I have been able to pass 2 levels. I've come close but I am always 1 or 2 turns away from clearing the level. I'm done with this game.

I genuinely love this game; but it has a bug when sporadically you go to watch ads to get more moves, and it freezes up. This results in you not only losing the level, but if you've won 10 levels and have super TNTs, you lose them and have to win ten more levels to get them back. It doesn't happen all the time, but it happens every few days and it's REALLY annoying when it does.

This used to be 1 of my favorite games but since Zynga bought it, they've ruined the game. Every update changes the goalpost on challenges making them mostly unattainable. I've been given a life sentence in Hoop Shot hell for over 3 months bc no one can achieve the goal they've set. Might as well do away with it altogether. U spend more time in legends arena than U do playing the regular levels. Need 2 put out more levels at 1 time and at a faster pace. Won't recommend. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

The update on 4/11/2019 totally changed the game. No longer do I get the option to send lives or ask friends for lives. Each game is harder and most times I might clear 2 games of the 10 required to collect a bonus. Then the time to get the bonus runs out and you have to start all over. I have played this game faithfully for a couple of years and I am amazed at the lengths the company will go to just to make another dollar. I have purchased many lives but no more. The fun is gone.

I'm probably the last person on earth to start playing these types of games. I was actually playing a different game very similar but I found myself constantly running out of lives & frustrated! So when I found this & began to play, I LOVED IT! So easy to figure out & so many things to earn & usw to make it even more fun & engaging. Plus being able to advance, collect bonuses & many other cool things all without having to spend ALOT of money! It's highly addictive in a good way! Just really enjoy it. I HIGHLY recommend it, def. worth getting!

Plan to spend a lot of money, otherwise will do well to get past level 150. The 'Boosters' you pay for that are supposed to help the player are placed in a part of the playing field that is least helpful. It costs 175 coins for 15 additional moves; 25 for 1st five, 50 for next 5, 100 for next 5. If you purchase 250, you can blow the whole stash of 250 in 2 levels, and the toys and boosters will be absorbed very quickly. Fun while it lasts, but not for long!

Somewhere around the first of the year, they changed it... you used to be able to go through levels much easier without having to use "boosters" that you earn (or buy). They also got rid of unlimited lives. This used to be my go to game because it was fun and relaxing...used to be able to play for hours...now it is just frustrating because either you are stuck at a level for days or you need to spend money to get past them. I wont pay now because you will only play until the money runs out.

UPDATE: I took off a star because I liked the game a lot more when they had unlimited play time prizes!! Now it's almost more of an annoyance/hassle. I was hoping they would bring the unlimited lives back but they haven't so I am considering uninstalling it all together. FYI: I tried uninstalling and reinstalling to start over and apparently they don't allow that anymore ðŸ¤¨ Fun and increasingly challenging! Great for kids and adults!

New Update is AWFUL. Have been playing for years and at the end of the game has always been "try again" button on the bottom left. Now it has the +5 moves for 25 coins. This is underhanded and sneaky to drain users of their coin bank, in a LAME attempt to get people to spend more money on coins. I am a top tier player (always in the extra "stages" - been playing for many years. If this is not fixed, I will uninstall the game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you feel this way. ðŸ˜ž We always appreciate our players' feedback to improve our game consistently. You can be sure that your feedback will be considered accordingly by our product team.

scraped_reviews.content: Another one bites the dust. I've played this game for years, and I've watched it go from fun and relaxing to being a cash grab. Went from having over 10k coins to less than 7k because of "hard" levels that are designed to make you have to use power ups to pass or there's no way to beat on your first attempt. Levels that there's no way to pass with the number of moves they give you. Bonus requirements being double what they used to be, and that is NOT an algorithm. Play Toon Blast instead.

I used to love playing this game, but a few times, it has screwed me over. I would make an in game purchase to get pass a level, and the game would just shut itself off. When I bring the game back up, my progress would be gone, any items like a super bomb would be gone, and I lost my money for NOTHING. This game has become increasingly frustrating and I want my money back for recent purchases......

Dishonest Algorithm. During sales and other events, (or if you're doing particularly well), the game makes it impossible to progress to the next level. As a result, the player is constantly being pushed to make in-game purchases. It seems to be somewhat of a pay-to-win game. It's a shame, because the gameplay itself is really fun and could be quite entertaining without such an aggressively controlling algorithm.

Just changed my 4-star rating to 1 because there's a notice that by continuing to play, I agree that Toy Blast can share my personal and video-viewing data. I'm deleting the game unless that changes. For the longest time, this has been my favorite game. No annoying ads, works like it should, and is more engaging than Candy Crush. However, my enjoyment has rapidly diminished as so many levels are now almost impossible to beat without boosters. Kind of takes the fun out of playing.

I would give this game 5 stars up until about 5 months ago. Now the game locks up on my phone at critical times. It's ALWAYS during the ads. Just when I hope I can continue, the game locks up, especially during the super TNT rounds. This makes me lose everything just when I think it's all going great. Unacceptable. Ads shouldn't hinder play. Period. I am very close to uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, We are sad to hear that you didnâ€™t have the best experience while playing our game. Please send us an in-game message by using the "Support" button in the "Settings" menu of the game; thus, we can check the problem you're referring to by reviewing your account details.

scraped_reviews.content: Was great until latest update. Now it seems there is no opportunity for unlimited lives, or at least none yet that I've come across in the new "Treasure Chest." At level 2138, I'm constantly running out of levels & "waiting" in the Legends Arena which seems to have no extra benefit at all. TBH, without unlimited lives at these levels, I play for 5 mins, & I'm done. It doesn't give me much reason to come back lately. I hope the next update goes back to the 2/4/24hr format, or something similar.

Good time killer (edit) WAS a good game. Now they took away many of the opportunities to gain gold and tools. I built up a stockpile of 4000 gold between level 1 and 2000, now in 200 levels it is almost gone. They removed the 25 gold chest every 48 hours, they lowered rewards (except for lives, which dont really get used.) It is a push to get people to buy gold. Game has been uninstalled. The game desperately needs a "shuffle the board" power up.

I have been playing since May 2022. I'm at the end of the game which means I have to wait for 50 new puzzles to come out every 2 weeks. I have gotten through 9,950 plus puzzle frames so I know I know how to play this game. But for some reason it's becoming impossible to pass each puzzle frame. Impossible for this to be happening but it is...read your players reviews. I understand it's a computer but something is wrong . 9,950 puzzle frames played by me and what I got stupid...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you feel this way. Our game is designed with a computer algorithm. The mechanism of the game works through this algorithm, and the cubes are determined randomly by the choice of this mechanism. If you need any further help, you can always contact us by using the "Support" button in our game.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been playing Toy Blast since at least 2016. I used to be so addicted to this game and spent more money on it than I care to admit. However, since the developers took away the super puzzle, it just isn't worth the time. The super TNT has some benefits, but it's more annoying than useful. Now that the super puzzle is gone, I have no desire to spend any more money on this game. I can use my "game money" on other games now.

title: GO2bank: Mobile banking
description:
A BETTER WAY TO BANKâ€”GET STARTED TODAY
GO2bankâ„¢ makes managing your money easier than ever. Open your account in minutes, grow your savings, and stay covered with overdraft protection, all with the secure mobile banking app designed for your everyday life. 

NO HIDDEN FEESâ€”JUST SMART BANKING
GO2bank puts simple, transparent banking tools at your fingertips so you can skip the monthly fee with eligible direct depositâ´, avoid hidden fees, and manage your money your way. 

OVERDRAFT PROTECTION FOR LIFEâ€™S CURVEBALLS
Get up to $300 in overdraft protection after eligible direct deposits and opt-inÂ¹. 

GET PAID EARLYâ€”STAY A STEP AHEAD
Get your paycheck up to 2 days early or government benefits, like unemployment, up to 4 days early when you set up direct depositÂ². Start getting your money on your schedule.

SAVE SMARTER WITH 4.50% APY
Grow your savings faster with a high-yield savings account that earns 4.50% APY with interest earned quarterly on balances up to $5,000â¶. 

BUILD CREDIT WITH A GO-TO 
Start building your credit score, one purchase at a time, one on-time payment at a time, with the GO2bank Secured VisaÂ® Credit CardÂ³.  

SECURITY & PEACE OF MIND
Keep your money safe with built-in tools you can trust. Lock your card anytimeâ¸, get real-time fraud alertsâ¹, and rest easy knowing your money is FDIC-insuredÂ¹â°.

NATIONWIDE CASH ACCESS
Withdraw cash for free at thousands of in-network ATMsâµ or deposit cash at over 90,000 major retailers nationwideâ·. Just use our in-app locator to find locations nearby.

Download the GO2bank app today to open an account and start banking with convenience, confidence, and control.

LEGAL DISCLOSURES
Online access, mobile number verification (via text message) and identity verification (including SSN) are required to open and use your account.

Mobile number verification, email address verification and mobile app are required to access all features.

1.	Fees, terms and conditions apply. Learn more at GO2bank.com/overdraft

2.	Early direct deposit availability depends on payor type, timing, payment instructions and bank fraud prevention measures. As such, early direct deposit availability may vary from pay period to pay period.

3.	Available only to GO2bank accountholders with direct deposits totaling at least $100 in the past 30 days. Eligibility criteria applies.   

4.	Monthly fee waived when you receive a payroll or government benefits direct deposit in the previous monthly statement period. Otherwise, $5 per month.  See our simple fees chart at GO2bank.com/fees

5.	See app for free ATM locations. $3 for out-of-network withdrawals, plus any additional fees the ATM owner or bank may charge. Limits apply.

6.	Interest paid quarterly on the average daily balance of savings during the quarter up to a $5,000 balance and if the account is in good standing. Fees on primary deposit account may reduce earnings on your savings account. 4.50% Annual Percentage Yield (APY) as of August 2025. APY may change before or after you open an account.

7.	Retail service fee up to $4.95 and limits apply.

8.	Previously authorized transactions and deposits/transfers to your account will function with a locked card.

9.	Message and data rates apply.

10.	Green Dot Bank also operates under the following registered names: GO2bank, GoBank and Bonneville Bank. All other registered trade names are used by, and refer to, a single FDIC-insured bank, Green Dot Bank. Deposits under any of these trade names are deposits with Green Dot Bank and are aggregated for deposit insurance coverage.

See Deposit Account Agreement at GO2bank.com/daa for details.

Cards issued by Green Dot Bank, Member FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A., Inc. Visa is a registered trademark of Visa International Service Association.

Technology Privacy Statement - www.go2bank.com/techprivacy

LEGAL DISCLOSURES
Online access, mobile number verification (via text message) and identity verification (including SSN) are required to open and use your account.

6. Interest paid quarterly on the average daily balance of savings during the quarter up to a $5,000 balance and if the account is in good standing. 7. Retail service fee up to $4.95 and limits apply.

8. Previously authorized transactions and deposits/transfers to your account will function with a locked card.

9. Message and data rates apply.

All other registered trade names are used by, and refer to, a single FDIC-insured bank, Green Dot Bank. Deposits under any of these trade names are deposits with Green Dot Bank and are aggregated for deposit insurance coverage.
