Awaiting response from the Fragment customer support for weeks, that's nonsense. All you get is an automated email saying verification might be a tough process, good to know especially when your problem is not about the verification at all, but about the funds you sent there. 1,250 USDT may be nothing for you, but that's a huge amount of money for an average Telegram user. Fragment support team, please get in touch with me whenever you do have a spare minute. Thanks in advance.

I don't know why, as compared to my old phone in which I was using this app, this app now works as hell!! The download keeps pausing on its own and slows down the downloading speed when minimised. Also whether it's a 5G network surrounding or LTE coverage, in both of the network areas, the download speed is just horrible whether you use your mobile data or wifi. Please fix this or else I will have to uninstall this app and find something more useful...Thank you...

It's good but is it messy. scraped_reviews.content: The download speed limit is just dumb. I can't even find a better way to describe how frustrating it is. y'all just be creating problems out of nowhere just to gain a little more money.ðŸ‘Ž and you even start charging fees for sending a damn verification message? crazy greed, even small scam apps didn't do it. so atp I suggest you remove the "free" part from your description. it clearly a lie.

Be aware: Telegram is vulnerable to social-engineering account takeovers. My friend received a message from a familiar number asking to â€œhelp a sick childâ€ with a link. After clicking it, attackers gained access, terminated all sessions, and flooded the login server to trigger a 24-hour timeout. Telegram has no way to temporarily block a hijacked account, and getting timely support is impossible.

Opening the message in it shows "updating connecting," but it takes a long time to proceed further. It's now classified as a useless app because the messages take so long to open. It receives a lot of spam messages, and it asks for a subscription to delete themâ€”this is beyond me. For all this, the app doesn't get any stars from me.

Telegram is a great app, definitely better than Whatsapp. Things like being able to send videos without terrible compression, cute stickers and true multi device support are awesome. But there's a dark side, the constant spam from fake women messaging me. I'd like to block non-contacts from messaging me, but guess what, this feature is behind paywall. It should not be, it's a security matter and in fact should be on by default. In addition to that, Telegram often fails to establish calls.

This is one of the worst apps Iâ€™ve ever used. It automatically deletes downloaded files without any warning or permission. I spent the entire night downloading files, and by morning, everything was gone â€” all my time and data completely wasted. This isnâ€™t just my issue; itâ€™s affecting many users. Please fix this serious problem immediately.

I used to use Telegram daily and it was my favourite app, but recently it has become extremely disappointing. I tried logging in again on my device and it now asks me to pay just to access my own account. Iâ€™m already logged in on another device, but it still refuses to send the login code through Telegram itself or even email. On top of that, downloads randomly stop after a few minutes by themselves for no reason. The app has gone backwards and became frustrating to use.

I u installed the app to try again and I can't login on my other account because for some reasons, I no longer receive sms/otp. Shameful really because this was one of my favorite messaging apps.

I would've given it a 5 but....2 issues I've been facing, the downloading speed is just horrible!!! having 5G and still the speed of downloading is 300-700KB/s??? really??? doesn't even get fixed after i turn the airplane on and off and clear the recent apps and restart telegram again!! The same happens when I open and see connecting/updating for like 10mins at the upper left corner FIX IT PLEASE!!! it's been months

The app it's good and very useful but since yesterday, it's impossible to download important voice messages that I have to listen for work, also, all the things that I want to download since it's not possible so I've uninstalled it this morning because I wanted to update the app. after installing it again , it's impossible for me to enter in the app and I don't understand why. if haven't use this app for work, I'll uninstall it since. Please resolve this problem, because I don't understand.

this app is the worst, I had to deal with getting hacked several times on three different accounts like how do the hackers get to my account using my phone number without me knowing and I only realize it after I've been logged out. and crazy thing when using one of my account out of the blue they ban me I wasn't doing anything!!! so now I can't get back in ever again unless I get another number to log into telegram.... thank telegram!... even a One Star is too much to give for this experience..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. If your account is frozen, please send an appeal in Telegram. If the phone is banned, contact recover@telegram.org. Include phone number + country code, and details. Never share your code with anyone, use official apps, and ensure your devices are secured. Numbers can be unbanned if the case is a false positive.

scraped_reviews.content: Very frustrating app. This app is incredibly frustrating. My phone was stolen, and now I canâ€™t even log back into my Telegram account because the verification code keeps getting sent to the stolen device instead of as an SMS. It makes no sense that people who lose their phones are locked out completely. Telegram really needs to fix this issue and make it easier for users to recover their accounts securely.

Confirm Google Play Services are enabled on your device and disable any active VPN. If issues persist, contact sms@telegram.org with your phone number in international format as the email subject.

title: WeChat
description:
WeChat is more than a messaging and social media app â€“ it is a lifestyle for over one billion users across the world. Chat and make calls with friends, share your life's favorite Moments, enjoy mobile payment features, and much more.

Why do over one billion people use WeChat?
- MORE WAYS TO CHAT: Message friends using text, photo, voice, video, location sharing, and more. Create group chats with up to 500 members.
- VOICE & VIDEO CALLS: High-quality voice and video calls to anywhere in the world. Make group video calls with up to 9 people.
- MOMENTS: Share your favorite moments. Post photos, videos, and more to your Moments stream.
- STATUS: post your status to capture your mood and share an ephemeral experience with friends
- STICKER GALLERY: Browse thousands of fun, animated stickers to help express yourself in chats, including stickers with your favorite cartoon and movie characters.
- CUSTOM STICKERS: Make chatting more unique with custom stickers and Selfie Stickers feature.
- REAL-TIME LOCATION: Not good at explaining directions? Share your real-time location with the press of a button.
-PAY: Enjoy the convenience of world-leading mobile payment features with Pay and Wallet (*only available in certain regions).
- WECHAT OUT: Make calls to mobile phones and landlines around the globe at super low rates (*only available in certain regions).
- LANGUAGE SUPPORT: Localized in 18 different languages and can translate friendsâ€™ messages and Moments posts.
- BETTER PRIVACY: Giving you the highest level of control over your privacy, WeChat is certified by TRUSTe.
- EXPAND YOUR WORLD WITH WEIXIN SERVICES: Activate Channels, Official Accounts, Mini Programs, and other features offered via WeChat's sister service, Weixin.
- AND MUCH MORE...

scraped_reviews.content: I can not delete my account. I've hardly used the app in any way, and it should not be so hard to delete the account. All the support documents I've seen (in English) give false information. I contacted help support, but the only response is in Chinese, and I can't find a way to translate it in the app (which I've heard is supposed to be a strong feature, and even a primary purpose for me to get the app). I also can't copy/paste to translate elsewhere.

Really bad app, lame programming, bad logic, constant hangs, constant security issues, constant hassles, locks account if you don't use it often, says it detected unusual activity on your account and asks for friend's information to unblock your account, but you can't contact your friends because you can't log in, so you have to call them or use another app. Why bother with this app if you have to have another one anyway? I switched to LINE, it works great.

WeChat is great for texting and has an incredible range of cute, free stickers. However, after less than a week, I've been locked out of my account twice for "suspicious activity" and need a friend to help me log back in through some convoluted process. Their help center says if you use Project Fi, then they recommend using a different phone number to connect... Unfortunately, this is also the only phone number I have. I like the app, but the login process really ruins the experience.

Can't activate my account because it has been "blocked due to security issues." Tried doing the 2 factor verification process, which failed, and then I tried to get a friend to verify. We followed all directions to a tee, and I still couldn't get unblocked. Oh, but I was able to set a password and give them access to my whole contacts list. You're welcome Chinese hackers. |-(

Horrible sign-up experience. I lost my password once, and ended up having to ask friends to ask other friends to pass on a verification request. When I tried to sign up my wife, I used up my "once per month" other-usee verification to verify her, and then when I went to the messages app to get the code they'd sent, the sign-up process logged out. After several days of trying she still has no account. It's just one of the worst apps to use if you're not living in China. Deeply frustrating.

Don't even bother downloading.  I had this app for less than a day and it's found "Suspicious activity' on my account and blocked me from accessing the account.  I can't recover my account and this was the only way I could get in contact with one of my friends. I am beyond furious, and wish they'd fix this issue, but judging from the other reviews they won't.

Need a different option to activate account! I have a "suspicious registration" that I've been unable to fix because I have to get a friend on WeChat to basically vouch for me. That could work if I knew anyone on there. Kind of hard to even meet anyone on the when you can't even get in for the first time. Useless app. No point in trying again since I've tried for like 3 months. You guys need more options than "phone a friend".

Spent 20min trying to set up a WeChat account. A constant loop of asking for verifications, and to topic off they wanted to use a bank card and take money out of your account. One of the most frustrating apps to use. There is a reason why WhatsApp is popular. Its set up is easy and straightforward, they don't ask for money as verification and the WhatsApp is far more superior in everyday use. Additionally is the app opens itself everytime your in a conversation with someone (no privacy).

downloaded the app. setup an account. made my profile. woke up in the morning to have my account blocked. i followed the instructions, many times, and had a friends try to verify my account like the app says to do. . it didn't work . i tried to contact the customer support, they are MIA. terrible customer service and app that blocks people randomly. I'm not the only one with the problem.

I used to have an account. I deleted the app because it was taking up too much space. Upon re-downloading the app I tried to sign in, only to be told that my phone number has not signed up for an account. I tried to create a new account and I've gotten 4 different error messages. This is one of the most aggrevating apps I've ever had to deal with. edit: I finally managed to create an account and typed in the verification code only to be told something like virtual numbers don't work.

Stupid 'security verification', it requires an existing WeChat user to scan your code. I don't have any Chinese friends near me, so I can't set up an account. I wanted WeChat for local Chinese-owned businesses like restaurants... Even up until that point, it was slow and kept crashing at the first screen. Can't even open the app, it freezes up completely. Terrible app

Generally a good app. A lot of useful mini programs, gifs, emotes, etc. WeChat pay is indespendible in China. But sometimes the overdone security features are very frustrating. I tried to sign in with a new phone and typed in the account ID and password. I didn't fail the password even one time but my account got locked for 3 days for "unusual activity". I did nothing wrong but now I have to wait. I can't even submit a ticket without a Chinese ID. It's stupid. I even approved it on the old phone

WeChat sucks. I created an account. 24 hours later I tried to log on. I got a message that suspicious activity was detected and was not able to logon. It instructed me to have another line user validate me. When thru the whole process and got to a point where it was asking for too many personal details like my id number and banking information. I don't have to provide that info to other messaging apps. I refuse to provide the information. I also logged a support request and never heard back.

Immediately after signup, without doing even a single thing, the account got locked. And to unlock the account, it says an existing WeChat "friend" had to help me. I don't have any yet, because it locked me out without doing anything. One of the most annoying onboarding experience ever. Reached out to support and they don't respond either.

Trying to get past the initial verifications made me just delete the app. First I attempted to accept the terms after signing up through Facebook (the page didn't work), then I decided to use my mobile. Turns out you have to have someone who already uses the app approve you (either by scanning the barcode or entering your number on their end into the system). Not going to happen. Really wish I could use WeChat...

Can't even sign up I have tried to create an account to communicate to a friend in China (I am in US). After 3 hours constant trying, phone calls and emails with the friend in China, I still can't sign up an account. I guess this app is designed specifically for mainland Chinese users and not for global applications. I gave up!!! Try LINE! It might be better.

The app is usually pretty handy. Other than the occasional wrong translation it works well enough. However, lately my app won't notify me of any new messages. I have checked all the my settings on my phone and everything is set up correctly. It is extremely frustrating to that I have messages and dont see them for hours, until I remember to open up the app and check.

I wish i could give this app zero stars. I had to create a 2nd account from my 2nd phone just to end up with that one blocked as well. I only added the app because someone recommended it for my travels in a few months; however, it was pointless to even download at this point. Especially when they don't have a way to really unblock your account on your own if your new to it. Garbage.

My account was blocked immediately after signing up. It required 3 stages of authentication and I am stuck on the last one. It requires another WeChat user to authenticate you. I only have 3 friends using WeChat and all 3 returned the same error code saying that their account is unable to authenticate. I emailed the dev for additional help and haven't received a reply yet. I'm very frustrated. I wish China would unblock a few chat apps so this one could have some competition.

In the process of signing up to use your app I was told to contact a another user of your app to help with the process finishing the process of signing up. I don't know of anybody else who uses your app especially in China! I'm sorry to say but that whole part there sent up a lot of red flags.! Especially in the end when they say well if you're having trouble just give them your phone number! I'm sorry but that is like the equivalent of giving somebody your social security number.

My account got locked for its inactivity, and I couldn't reactivate it. Verification with your friend's help (another WeChat account) doesn't work. Even though my friend's WeChat says that my account has been activated again, I still can't log in as the app tells me that my account needs to be reactivated. The app sucks. Terrible user experience.

The app is really spammy & has gone downhill. When I recovered my acct I lost all my messages. I'm close to uninstalling it. I get this obnoxious pop up that randomly comes on my screen multiple times a day to set up my bank account to use their quick pay option. I only have notifications turned on if I receive messages. I don't even run the app in my background, yet the moment I turn on my phone or use another app I randomly get the pop ups. It's their way to coerce me to sign up. Complete BS.

I only use this to contact friends in China, and it works great. I have found no issues with the app. However, my one problem is trying to unrestrict my account. It requires you to contact a friend and have them verify you which can be annoying and I wish there was a feature where you can verify yourself without friends or just individually. Good app nonetheless

Can't sign up with email or VOIP #, which are the only two things I have. Many other chat apps allow other options so this app is useless and a waste of time. Even more so as it had to download and install something else first, then takes you all the way through the registration wasting your time just to fail with an error it can't work after sending you a code making you think it will. garbage

I used to use this regularly when I lived overseas. I tried to reactivate it, but they required me to send a confirmation code to a phone number in the country I was originally. After pestering a friend over there to receive my verification code, it then required me to input a phone number of someone I know who uses WeChat. I proceeded to ask two different friends here to do that, it said they weren't qualified for "assistant registration". Same problem for making a new account here. I'm done.

Wechat uses a lot of space. When you reinstall the app most conversations are deleted unless you have saved them. When you send pictures and videos if the original is deleted then you can't see the picture or video anymore. Whenever there is not enough storage it sends a ton of pop-ups which are very annoying. It seems like an okay app but I would rather use other messaging apps.

If you're a tourist in China, use Alipay for shopping or payments. It's usually accepted at any merchants that take Wechat Pay, but it's better for tourists because it truly allows Visa and Mastercard usage at any merchants even if the merchant doesn't accept debit or credit cards, or if they only accept Unionpay. WeChat Pay only allows you to input any of your Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Discover cards into the app, but it usually never works when the time comes to pay.

TL;DR- there's no way to unlock an account. So if you sign up but don't make a friend immediately, and something strange happens to your account, it will be blocked, and the only way to unblock it is to have a friend help you... Which you don't have, so there is literally no way to get on WeChat if anything happens to your account before you make friends.

If I try and register with my phone I instantly get flagged for a suspicious account. When I try to verify my account through their procedures all that happens is the verification window expires even though friends have done the steps they ask. It's been anything but a pain for me to deal with this app, hope others don't have the same experience.

Tried to get on after starting an account a few days ago. Got flagged for abnormal activity. Have spent about an hour doing stupid puzzles and entering my number and asking people to help unblock. Nothing is working. I suspect something is broken in the account unblock flow. If wechat is determined to not have me use the app, then very well, I give up.

First had issues verifying my phone and account. It was blocked. Never used the service before. Finally get in and tried to update my region (Florida). From there, no locations match where I am and no way to add my own "region" - the 3 listed under Florida are in another language anyway. Stupid. No way to contact support either. Uninstalling this garbage. Waste of time but I bet they got information from me and my contacts (permission required upon installation).

I'd give zero stars if I could. Created an account for things related to work and used it for about an hour this morning. Now, after midnight, after not using it all day, I'm being told my account is blocked because of registering too many accounts or not downloading from an official source. I downloaded it from here, and downloaded the desktop version from the website. Haven't touched either version in over 12 hours. Complete garbage. I wish to delete my account for the app.

Can't even sign up. It keeps on telling me "Unusual network or device environment. Try using a stable connection". The earlier stage of verification is also having problems. Like "choose two trees in winter" I pressed it, it said success then failed. Which one do you want? What's even the point of asking for it if it's not going to work. What's up with "invite another user to complete registration"? Unnecessary steps. I don't know if the devs are going to read this but fix those issues asap

I think the app has a problem when it comes to global accounts. I mean, I have a +86 phone number and that account worked very well. According to people, it wants your credit card number, but I think that is only for the paying function inside it, if you want to pay via it. Personally, I will not recommend it to people without a +86 phone number. I don't really think that the company is actually looking at the ratings of global users, unfairâ˜¹ï¸

What a horrible app and even worse customer concern. It took them over a week to answer my sign-in concerns. It's just impossible to sign-in too. It constantly gives the message "Too many operators", and no matter what you do, it very allows you to sign-in. My three week holiday in China without any success of being able to sign-in. Horrible app.

It's uncomfortable to use, at first you need a lot just to log in. When I finally got to use the app after two days I got an notification that I have to verify my account and if I don't do it I cannot accept any requests or something. But when I tried to verify the account and choose call verification as an option it says that there are too many attempts and I have to do it later. I've been trying all day. And as for other options you have to register your card, and I won't do that.

Spent 20min trying to set up a WeChat account. A constant loop of asking for verifications, and to topic off they wanted to use a bank card and take money out of your account. One of the most frustrating apps to use. There is a reason why WhatsApp is popular. Its set up is easy and straightforward, they don't ask for money as verification and the WhatsApp is far more superior in everyday use. Additionally is the app opens itself everytime your in a conversation with someone (no privacy).

Spent 20min trying to set up a WeChat account. A constant loop of asking for verifications, and to top it off they wanted to use a bank card and take money out of your account. One of the most frustrating apps to use. There is a reason why WhatsApp is popular. Its set up is easy and straightforward, they donâ€™t ask for money as verification and WhatsApp is far more superior in everyday use. Additionally the app opens itself everytime youâ€™re in a conversation with someone (no privacy).

My account has been suspended indefinitely just because I switched to a new phone ðŸ«¥. The security optimisation for wechat is absymal, I've tried everything, including contacting customer support, and the only way to log back into the account is to physically BE IN the account through a "frequently used device". But clearly that isn't going to work as it logged me out of my previous phone and is now showing the same message. ðŸ«¥

It's an app I use the most everyday. However, it starts having problems to receive messages recently. If someone messages me, I mostly got notification 20 minutes or more time after they sent me the message. The worst is, sometimes when they called on Wechat, my phone is not ringing at all. I hope the app developer can fix this promptly .

I spent literally days trying to figure out the verification, the friend verification? Ok, passed, then it crashed, can't be that bad? No, it changed into a password typing machine, I got the password, typed it it, hit submit and still get it wrong, I literally copied and pasted it, doesn't even work, hell! Even the company doesn't respond to reviews like us, so I don't guarantee that they update the app in the customer's choices.

Probably the worst of all the Chinese apps. Absolutely horrible app. This app is almost an essential to travel around China with ease. However, during our 4 weeks we couldn't sign-in to it not even once. And the "customer 'service" is atrocious. They took 2 weeks to reply to our problem. Absolutely comical. And they STILL didn't solve our problem which apparently is extremely common with WeChat. I don't know why the Chinese make their apps so difficult to sign-in to. It's ridiculous. Horrible.

I've used WeChat on and off for about a couple years now. The call quality is really good, texting is simple, you can access QQMusic, PDD, etc through mini programs. however recently I've tried to log in and it says "Too many operations. try again" which is weird considering I only try to log in once. And every time I clear app cache, reinstall, clear phone cache, etc it doesn't seem to change this issue. I recommend Line and WhatsApp. never had an issue with those 2. having issues with WC.

there are too many QR codes and it's hard to register and also to accept friend requests from my friends. most of the words are in Chinese which is very difficult to read .not to mention sharing a moment videos don't go only pictures I am in Africa and it's very difficult for me to get someone to scan me just so that I can verify friend requests and registration

This the most cumbersome app I have encountered. To register I need someone with hard enough restrictions to verify. When the registration is successful, my account is being blocked after reading an article promoted by your mini program. And you make it impossible for me to unblock as the person who help to verify the registration is the only friend that I have in my wechat account. She is a receptionist in a hotel in China. I don't think you sincerely want as many people to use your app

I can't even make it past the sign up page. It requires another user of the app to scan a QR code. Pointless. Am I supposed to go around the whole population of the country and ask if they are on the app? if I exit the QR page it returns me to the sign up page. It's an absolutely pointless app that's poorly thought out on how to get new users. 3 months later and no reply from the owners of the app shows the lack of accountability or customer care. Don't bother with this app, it's pointless.

While in China I changed my contact phone number to +86 number. Back home, followed bad advice to clear cache and data to fix something. Now I can't log in because I can't receive SMS on the +86 number (it was only a one month SIM). Can't scan QR because can't log in and scanning can only be done in the app. WeChat will not help because now I'm in Weixin and my Chinese isn't good enough to use Weixin customer service. What a mess. This is my only way to contact my friends in China.

When I first joined the app there were no problems or anything. Then, a few days later my account was reported for harassing others, which I didn't even do. I waited for some days to remove the restriction but WeChat kept saying error again and again.

so hard to use, and to make an account, you need to go through so many pointless steps that no one needs for international users who don't have Chinese numbers like why do I need to literally search for users to scan my code to sign up??? and the Facebook function doesn't work too! you really need to remove those steps! like what's wrong with only a verification sms for international users! please make things easier for us

Iâ€™m really disappointed with this app. I had a bad experience trying to log in and recover my accountâ€”the system kept giving me errors. The verification process is confusing and frustrating, and it feels like once you lose access, youâ€™re completely stuck.

title: MapFactor Navigator
description:
* Best rated free offline navigation app on Google Play with 35 mil+ installs*
Now for Android Auto!

MapFactor Navigator is a free GPS navigation app with free offline maps from OpenStreetMaps (incl. free monthly maps update). Navigate without an internet connection in more than 200 countries. Intuitive voice turn-by-turn navigation, speed limits, camera warnings and other useful features.

Key features of MapFactor GPS Navigation app:
- voice navigation in various languages
- door-to-door route planning
- overview of the upcoming maneuver and distance shown on the screen
- free offline maps with postcodes (full GB postcodes) installed on your device or SD card
- points of interest (incl. EV chargers)
- speed limit and camera warnings 
- favorite routes and places
- 2D/3D mode allows realistic visual maps display
- day/night mode
- routing modes for car, bus, truck, pedestrian, bicycle, motocycle, mobilehome
- route avoidance - block off certain road from your route
- maps rotate in driving direction or north up
- customization possibilities
- Android Auto connectivity

Optional features:
- professional TomTom maps
- Premium Features: Alternative routes, Head-Up Display, No ads, App color themes
- Live HD Traffic info (80+ countries)
- Online Search
- Remote commands

OSM maps are created by community of volunteers at www.osm.org and are updated every month for FREE.

Navigator Truck (TomTom maps) for large vehicles avoids restrictions like low bridges and narrow lanes.

MapFactor also makes the popular NavigatorFREE GPS navigation software for PC, Pocket PC, WinCE and iOS.

For help/feedback to our GPS navigation emailÂ android@mapfactor.com.

summary: GPS Navigation - offline maps from OSM & TomTom. Android Auto, Live Traffic.

scraped_reviews.content: Works great once you take the time to set it up the way you want it. Map update downloads now require my phone to be unlocked and with the navigator app fronted to download. It use to download even when the phone entered standby mode but not now making map update downloads to be very painful. Also it seems when there are updates it is all maps need to be downloaded. This also seems different from how it use to be a few years ago.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Pete, for Navigator to work n background you need to set Always on in Android settings/location/Navigator. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Still one of the best offline navigation apps out there. I never had a problem with it. I'm dropping my 5 stars down to 4 not so much to penalize the developers, but because I am disappointed that you can't search for your destination as easily as you could before ever since Google made the option unavailable from within the app.

Decent details only wish you could put in actual street number in phone version.  Years later I continue to use this program as one of my primary nav programs.  Love the fact that you can get maps from around the world for free.  I've also seen where this program works better than the one in the rental car!  Overall, a nice product (...but still wish there were more street addresses in the database!).

Been using this app since 2013 and it worked great. This spring I noticed that distances were way off compared to other navigator apps. Then, during a trip last week the app bugged me with "Recalculating the route" voice notifications every second when I used it on dirt roads and wouldn't follow the exact route. That was soo annoying that I had turned it off altogether and missed my turn. I realized it too late which cost me extra 2 hours of driving :((
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ulzinasan, we made no change to route calculation, problem could be incorrect vehicle settings. Please email departure and destination in coordinnates, we will check. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Used it today in the the mountain forest roads and it work wonders. I didn't think it would show the roads up there but it did, and was I relieved. No more paper maps for me. Updates: I'm trying to love this app, but all the knick picking cost for features that should be built in is steering me away, especially when Google Maps does more for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi V, please understand that we have to make money to keep developing, we do not use your private data for financial gain like most others. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: The mapping works offline, which is why I got it. I then purchased some of the upgrades, like multiple routes, and that worked great... Until one day the app reported that I no longer had the upgrade and is prompting for another purchase. This had happened twice now. The app has also wiped my addresses and will not let me import them from my contact list, either. If you need the offline mapping, get this, otherwise PASS! I've used the same Google Play account since Samsung Galaxy S3 came out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kurt, premium features are linked to your Google account, please make sure that you are logged in with one you used for purchase. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 10/2018: I still use this and on my main phone. I've used it successfully in Tokyo, Taiwan, S. Korea, Germany, and navigating Yellowstone National Park. It is often not quite as good as the big name data plan napping software, but it is still pretty good and my go to option when signal is week or nonexistent. 2015: I've used this on a spare android I've picked up mostly for audiobooks & as a backup phone requiring just a sim card insertion. However, on trips to Costa Rica, Honduras, & Belize it was very good. I didn't have a data plan in these countries, but preloaded the maps, rented a car, and drove across the countries for a day to a week w/o issues. A couple times locals had better suggestions & a few times we got turned around, but using the free SW & free maps is very polished for the price.

Years of location information gone for no reason. I didn't change a thing on my phone but app decided it couldn't do anything without being reinstalled. Pen & paper more reliable. To be clear, I never uninstalled the original. I turned it on and it couldn't recognize where it was. I directed it to the SD card that it couldn't find for some unknown reason. After I did that, it acted like a new, previously never used app. (?)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, what makes you think that Navigator deleted anything? It is Google who deletes everything when you uninstall. That is why we provide backup. Please reconsider your unfair rating. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: I have tried a number of free navigation apps, and they were all very poor except for this one, MapFactor. I have used it in many countries on extended auto touring trips as well as city walking tours to keep from getting lost. I have it on my 8 inch androit tablet and set it on the center console while driving. The free open source maps are excellent. Easy to store multiple routes with multiple way points on sites of interest. Overall, an outstanding Navigation System.

I have used this app for years, for everything from mountain biking expeditions to long-distance car trips and navigating on foot in New York City. I would give it five stars if it weren't for one little quirk where it had us get off on an exit and then get right back on the same highway for no apparent reason. It only happened in one spot and other than that it works great and it's wonderful that it is free and has offline maps.

It works again, yeah! Once again my favorite offline navigation app for Android. Only reason for the missing fifth star is that navigation on foot and with public transit is still more cumbersome than necessary. Would be great if subway stations could be made even more prominent on the map, and with the name of the lines they're on. If I could give 4.5 stars I would have. Please keep improving this, it's getting better release by release.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Peter, you gave the lowest rating, please email and explain what the problem is, we would like to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Hate it! Very confusing and cumbersome set up to download needed maps. Once downloaded, found it difficult to figure out how to set destination, and then equally difficult to figure out how to request route. After all that, I was told that no route was found. Both departure point and destination were established US addresses that Google Maps successfully gives me a route between immediately. Far too much trial and error tapping various icons in an attempt to find what I'm looking for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Robert, please look at this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hEwLDJuDX5U. Please reconsider your unfair rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I'm here to review the app not for help. As I said resizing the info bar to Small still too large. Too many useless settings. Won't pay premium for an app not working properly. Can't find all addresses. Doesn't show name of the street you turning next (don't tell me it's on the bottom, it's not there). Many other free choices out there offering better experience ðŸ˜‰
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aziz, you can resize it by holding bar for 2s. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here. Alternative outes are premium feature, you van buy in Tools. Street you are turning to is shown t the bottom. You shoud be asking questions before giving unfair rating. Please email if you want help, cannot support here

scraped_reviews.content: Very fast customer support, allowed me to transfer my paid maps to a new phone (android), and I honestly didn't have to really do anything myself. GPS works best with the offline, multi line search. One line doesn't really like to work though, and google search doesn't work at all (NOT the developer's fault). Really nice, very useful app!!! Changed from 2-star to 5.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephen, licencing issues cannot be resolved by 2*, you need to contact us. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Used it a few times. Doesn't tell you what the next street is that you have to turn on is. Only gives the distance and direction. GPS is spotty, but GPS works fine in other apps. Map will often stop centering on the car. Response to Dev Response: I'm not wanting to hear the street name. I want the map to show it. There's other issues with the voice guidance even if I wanted that, which I don't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin, to hear street names you need to set TTS in settings/localisation/sounds. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst GPS app I have used in recent memory. It soaks up ALL the phone's resources FOR NOTHING. the navigation is horrible as well, if you ever get the thing to find an address. It will not adjust to the addition of way points, instead it just tacks them to the end and NOTHING you do changes that. I paid for the maps, and I WILL GET THAT MONEY BACK. I don't put in "coordinates", I enter an address via standard American Address format. i.e. number street, city, state, zip. I also placed markers for "start" and "stop" directly on the map. Doesn't matter how I found start and destination, it drained my battery to nearly dead in a matter of Minutes, and every time (without exception) I tried to search a route it would lock up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Howard, may be you set your vehicle incorrectly? Please email departure and destination in coordinates, we will check. We have few types of searching, please look to https://youtu.be/hEwLDJuDX5U Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: Too complicated for vehicle radio head unit. KEEP IT SIMPLE. Less buttons and less clicks is safer driving. Look at a GARMIN GPS for reference. Large text, large Speed limits, large destination time. It does work with offline maps and GPS antenna. However, there needs to be a simple way to just enter an address for your destination library. Such as "Enter a new Destination to SAVE" Has anyone from this software developer tested this APP on a head unit with real people?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rhomis, please look at this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hEwLDJuDX5U. Further tips on how to use Navigator: https://bit.ly/dyk-en. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a solid offline GPS app. I have not had good luck with offline navigation apps before, but I was pleasantly surprised with this one...it did not let me down. Some of the speed limits were wrong, but directions were always good. Functionality takes a little getting used to... could maybe be easier, but with time it's learnable. My biggest issue with it is it's not easy to shut down the app completely. That could definitely use improvement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jennifer, please use Back on your device to close Navigator. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded local maps (US) on my S24+ to test and it worked. Interested because you can download maps for offline use. Needed settings so I could download maps for Iceland but could not figure how. I see a map and 3 customizable tabs on the bottom. Long press brings up a menu but settings or maps is not one of them. Tried swiping every direction, single tap , double tap, long press everywhere and could not find settings again. Navigation is simply not intuitive so deleted and moved on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Don, to download maps go to Tools/ map manager. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please. Kindly amend your raatings, thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the fact that it doesn't try to force people to have data on to be able to navigate. The search is more challenging since Google doesn't allow MapFactor to use their map search base any longer. If that gets fixed, it's a 5 star. (New Review) BUT NOW... I don't appreciate that out of eleven searches I've done since the last update, I haven't been able to find ONE. Is this a way to force me to buy maps? As per your app "If you would like better results, please purchase." And there isn't any easy to find info of how much it costs, and how often often to pay. My only option is to use an app that allows me to find locations and use data, (I have unlimited anyway.) Why would buying the maps yield me better results? Now, I don't tell anyone of your app. I used to tell everyone. Good luck.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Patrick, please look at this - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-LrnHL-BjbVA2oSq3CAjUSCXhowNffqs/view. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Drain battery fast. I just updated to the lastest version hopping that the battery drain would be better (was not an issue in older versions) but now this version is even worse because when I start my GPS, the location is off by about 1 mile.... that's really bad and no longer useful to me. I also updated the map (Florida), so not sure if the issue is with the program or the map for the GPS discrepancy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steph, please install GSam battery to get accurate consumption per app. You will see that Navigator does not consume any more then any other offline navigation. GPS is controlled by Android, Navigator cannot make GPS reception better or worse. Try to reboot your device, it quite often helps.Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't use address stored in phone contacts. I didn't like the interface as much as some of the other apps. - - I got a response to my review that I don't understand. - - Does it mean for me to go to my phone contacts look, up an address, and then type it in your app? Because instead of doing that I can just use an app that brings up my contacts and lets me choose which one to travel to!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, go to Contacts and click any address, then select Navigator. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please. No, it means clicking the address and selecting Navigator from apps offered. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: The biggest issue is the quality of maps. I bought the TomTom maps and the maps within the city when there is traffic look horrible!! Its like a 10 year old did his best to draw a city map with colors that have gone out of the boundaries!! The roads underneath the overpass hide the purple guidelines!! Then despite setting up the vehicle parameters it has led me to such narrow and hilly roads. Choosing bus profile makes it to turn 10 min route into 20 min route along the freeways. I regret buying
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Uday, you can create your own colour scheme in settings/map customisation. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had it lock up while simulating a route but it's been rock steady while navigating. my only real irritation is that when it interrupts my audio player the player doesn't resume after the navigation instructions. pretty much impossible to use this and listen to an audio book. But for a free navigator that works well offline it is great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Lee, thanks for your review. We are continuously developing our app to keep our users satisfied. Constructive comments such as yours help us to fix bugs and improve the app. If you had any other issues regarding the application we recommend to contact directly our Support team at support@mapfactor.com. Thank you. Dana, MapFactor

scraped_reviews.content: Route not found - get used to hearing this. It shows my location. It finds my destination. Click on navigate... Route not found. UPDATE: I can get it to find a route but only by allowing non-roads option in navigation. So, I guess that if I don't mind driving on the occasional sidewalk, it's fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Andrew, may be you set your vehicle incorrectly? Please email departure and destination in coordinates, we will check. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: App not intuitive at all on my Samsung Galaxy Note 4 on Verizon. I deleted it after several days of totally unuseable results. For a trip of 500-550 miles, 90% of which is on Interstate highways and usually takes us 10 hours including stops for gas, etc, it keeps giving me distances of between 1400 and 1700 miles each taking 25-30 hours each. All I want is it to follow the route I have POIs on (not necessarily the fastest, shortest, or cheapest). I paid for the extended services bundle.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Roger, may be you set your vehicle incorrectly? Please email departure and destination in coordinates, we will check. Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Update 201811: updated to v4.0.85 and ability to multi-touch map and see distance line has disappeared on my Galaxy S7 yet it still works fine on Galaxy Tab E and LG Tab. Hoping this can be corrected although not a major issue. Update: > The latest version as of early January 2018 caused problems on both my phone and tablet. Detailed maps disappeared and left me with only major roads. The navigation engine also seemed to have problems finding a solution for long journeys. I reverted back to the previous version and don't seem to have the same problem with street detail after clearing the app cache but routing a long journey still appears to be very slow. Otherwise still very good. < Very good in it's own right but even better when considering the functionality and cost (paid app & OSM maps here). I also use Copilot and, while it's very good as well, the map update schedule doesn't even compare. I also use the PC based version but the mobile version is much easier to use. I've seen people complain about the app and OSM maps but can't imagine why. Installing OSM maps has even added new life to several of my old Garmin handheld and mobile units. Everyone should applaud the hard work and incredible results offered to all of us by this team and those who make OSM maps available. Many here are too young to appreciate what is offered and the occasional shortcomings. Go buy a paper atlas and some gas station maps and rethink your complaints.

This is one of the lamest apps I've ever used. It's GPS location service really sucks it won't locate me within several miles of where I am. My other navigational apps work just fine. Plus I only downloaded Oregon and Washington and it took one hour and 15 minutes and I do not have a slow connection. What the heck is with that. I just tried this app again after a year-and-a-half and it is just as bad now if not worse than it was the first time around. it would take the Developers would make impro
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, GPS is controlled by Android, Navigator cannot make GPS reception better or worse. Try to reboot your device, it quite often helps. Please reconsider your unfair rating. Help by email please. Servers are fine - pleasee email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: I have found this app invaluable on several occasions when lost in the wilderness. It shows trails, not just highways. As long as you download the maps, you don't need an Internet connection, which is often not available in remote locations. They offer both free and paid maps. I have found the free to be perfectly satisfactory.

Great in a variety of countries. Good reliable road information. Trail information present but not slways up to date. It has crashed on me twice when I needed it. Of course only use as a reference. Use printed maps out in the real world. I don't like the updated more limited search capability.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Maxine, new search is not limited, in fact you now have four types of search, instead of three. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: "Route Not Found" multiple times. Other times system crashed and the NAV shut down. NOT ACCEPTABLE for the $40 I was charged to use the "truck routes" function, for the system to shut down while I'm going 60 KPH on a road with other vehicles and I don't know where I can and cannot go. I emailed the DEV and big suprize... no response. Looking for a "decent" app for Trucks? Try Hammer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ohm, most likely coprrupted files or faulty SD - close navigator, go to Android settings, select Application manager and then Navigator, click Clear data and then reboot your phone. Please backup first, you could loose your favourites.( android/data/com.mapfactor.navigator/files/navigator) Please reconsider your rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Mapfactor Navigator's most important feature is that it works offline with maps stored on your device, so you don't have to worry about using an excessive amount of mobile data. You download the maps at home on Wi-Fi, and you only have to download the regions that you need. Note that the routing depends on the accuracy of the OSM maps, which may contain errors. Before leaving home for a long road trip, I recommend verifying that the route calculated by this app is actually the route you want.

I have been using this app for about 8 years. For the last couple of years, I have had increasingly more failures with map updates. To update maps, not uncommon to restart the map update process 20 times after critical app failure and having to restart after app lost Wi-Fi signal. The past 6 months, the maps will not update at all. I have a Samsung A53. Edit, response below by developer fixed problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: \\\\\hi \brent, possibly you need to set Always on in Android settings/location/Navigator. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: Rarely good offline navigation. Even the free maps are extremely precise and even the dirt roads and forest roads are marked. The voice guidance is superbly done. The application does not take up a lot of resources, it can be used with quality even on weaker phones. For years, my favorite in the sea of similar applications, but only one is Navigator. P.S Consider doing to Space X map to Mars,ðŸ˜†

Easy to use. However had started stalling and would not clear previous journey route. New route would not be taken. So removed App & re-installed. Appears to be working but will need to carry out an actual test soon. Not sure why it behaved that way. Any suggestions? Enjoy your evening. Cheers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, probably corrupted files? Best is to contact us before installation.

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent app, very useful, however I cannot change units from km and km/h to miles and MPH. I looked through all options in Settings but cannot find it. At the same I can't believe that such an excellent and versatile app doesn't have an essential feature available in any navigation app. Am I missing something? Can anyone help?

like the app, except for one very irritating problem is that when opening the map button there is no Menu button on my mobile whereas on my tablet there's a Menu button which lets me look for addresses, POI, ect. Try as I might it isn't there. Using android 13 on a Sony mobile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michael, please use Back on your device. Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: Started using this app about 10 years ago when data and roaming costs were high. I could not find a better offline navigation. Use it primarily in Germany. But used it also in Netherlands, Denmark, Greece, USA and India. Just good. The open Street maps it uses are updated often. I still enjoy using it. Has been continuously updated with new features. I have not yet tried the live traffic feature, though.

Great app. I use it all the time, both in the USA and abroad. Put it on your phone and you don't need to rent a GPS. It uses Android Auto and, unlike Google maps, does not require a phone signal. Consider donating to the developer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, I have no idea what are you describing. We have not changed anything in map deletion and it is above navigation bar as it was before. Please reconsider your unfair rating. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: I am rating 5 stars for this app because it is very useful even without a cellular phone signal, it can navigate real time.
Excellent offline navigation app the quick view switch button is addictive! I jusr wish they had a lifetime maps subscription plan, as others do.
Not sure what happened to this App, updated version doesn't allow me to select my Destination?? No menu, or selection button.
it is ok but needs a shut down option or it keeps running in the background.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John, to close Navigator you need to click Back on your device. Help by email please.

scraped_reviews.content: been using this occasionally for quite a long time. thanks to the offline maps it has gotten me out of nowhere to somewhere many times. it's not my standard choice cause it gets a bit too creative with routes for my liking but it always finds a way. Found a very alternative route home from my job - never want to drive there again but it was interestingðŸ˜† surprisingly it makes quite a good hiking app, especially in areas where there's little to no signs & paths are hardly recognisable as such

One of, if not, the best SatNav I have tried. Better than Google Maps in that you don't get annoying "...is it still there..." questions popping up every few minutes. Waze was really annoying for that, too. I also like the way that this creates your route. One addition to make it better would be to have a list of Fuel Stops along a route? If it's already there...sorry, but I missed it. Still, 5 stars though.

Hard work...   sometimes it will talk, sometimes not, sometimes it will say a bit then shut up.  Like "roundabout" or "200 yards".  some days it is fine.   Great app if you have a passenger to read it for you...   Needs lots of improvements,  sorry.  Not my phone, others work fine.  EDIT...NOW it has stopped talking to me altogether, won't send anything via bluetooth.  I'll give it another go then probably go back to sygic..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marv, try to delete sounds and redownload. Help by email please. I would look at Android settings instead of giving low rating to Navigtor.

scraped_reviews.content: Not useful for me. I think it takes to long to search for a directions if you just want to drive from A to B in the same town. First you have to enter the town, then postal code (which I often don't have), then street name and then number. No way for a short cut. And another big disadvantage is also that you don't have the opportunity to search a route with public transport. Well I like that you can use the app offline. So I give this app two points.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Love, Navigator offers more types of searching, also a one-line search (please watch https://youtu.be/hEwLDJuDX5U). Further tips how to use Navigator: https://bit.ly/dyk-en. May you have any further questions, please contact us on support@mapfactor.com for further help. We would appreciate if you reconsider your rating. Thank you. MF

scraped_reviews.content: What a pile of junk. Worst map so far. Always wants money for something. Tried the free. Does not give an option of 3 routes unless you upgrade. Everything seems to revolve around upgrades. Other free apps are 10x better. Road lords is just one that offers so much more for free. Plus the option of 3 routes and fuel, cameras on route. Still only 1 star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Key, to download free maps you need to open Navigtor FREE - se;ection is on the first pafe. Please reconsider your unfair rating, Help by email please. Please email if you want help, we cannot support you here.

scraped_reviews.content: Used this for many years, its a good navigator that works well on my samsung. Adds are at lock-out only, other navis are much worse in that regard. You can add favourites and waypoints on your route, although the management of these could be a touch easier for old school boys like myself. On that note, would be great if there was a setting that makes text information a bit bigger? In any way, 5 out of 5 and a big thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Toni, thanks for your 5* rating and a positive review. Reg. text size: You can adjust size of texts in maps in Settings/Map customisation/Map scale. Other texts in the app are given by the text size, which you have set in Android phone settings. Would this help? PS: Ads at lock-out are not displayed anymore. Full help by email. Best regards.MF

scraped_reviews.content: Once payed for, the truck settings kick in. Avoids low bridges and weight limits. It has a few little niggles. When you deviate off route, sometimes takes a while to sort itself out. Some of the routes it takes are poss liby a little questionable, but better than other apps I've used by far. The HD traffic isn't worth paying extra for however.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kriston, truck attributes are frequently missing in free maps, routing would not be reliable. For that reason truck version is with TomTom maps only - Map manager/buy maps. Please reconsider your unfair rating. Help by email please.

title: Grubhub: Food Delivery
description: When in doubt, go for takeoutâ€”Grubhub has it all! Order food delivery from thousands of restaurants, including local spots and national chains, and get groceries delivered too. Prefer pickup? No problem. Know the fees upfront and track orders from Grubhub delivery partners in real timeâ€”the only surprise is just how easy takeout can be. ORDER FROM THOUSANDS OF RESTAURANTS With Grubhub, you can order takeout from your favorite local restaurants and everyoneâ€™s favorite chains. There are so many good eats out there, but you obviously deserve the best. Grubhub makes it easier to choose your next meal with restaurant ratings and reviews. French fries, pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donutsâ€”itâ€™s all here, whenever a craving strikes. GET GROCERIES DELIVERED TOO Think beyond your breakfast, lunch, and dinner orders. Grubhub offers the ultimate convenience with grocery delivery, in addition to restaurant takeout. Order milk, bread, snacks, and frozen foods, as well as household essentials like paper towels and laundry detergent, from local convenience stores. EXPECT TO SEE THE FEES UPFRONT Grubhub gives it to you straight. See the delivery fee upfront, before you start crafting the perfect food order. Pay your way with credit cards, Grubhub gift cards, or Venmo. SKIP DELIVERY FEES The key is Grubhub+. Sign up for unlimited $0 delivery fees on eligible orders, and enjoy exclusive offers and rewards as a Grubhub+ member.* Try Grubhub+ free for 30 days, then level up for just $9.99/month. The truth is, food tastes even better when you spend less on delivery. See details below. TRACK DELIVERY IN REAL TIME Grubhub puts your delivery on the map. Track eligible orders in real time, from the restaurant to your front door, and know the moment your bacon-egg-and-cheese arrives. Every delivery is a special delivery with Grubhub. COUNT ON THE GRUBHUB GUARANTEE Get your food delivered on time and at the lowest price. Guaranteed, or weâ€™ll make it right. See details: grubhub.com/guarantee YOU DO YOU AND GRUBHUB DELIVERS Grubhub serves up a personalized app experience, so you can reorder that feast youâ€™re still thinking about from two months ago. Order sauce on the side, go for extra pickles, lose the onionsâ€”Grubhub gets you. Are you a regular? Get rewarded when you come back for more at the same restaurants. You can also plan ahead by pre-ordering food for pickup or delivery. ORDER FROM NATIONAL RESTAURANTS Sometimes you need a sure thing, and thatâ€™s why Grubhub partners with national restaurants to offer the takeout food you know and love. Get delivery from Applebeeâ€™s, Arbyâ€™s, Buffalo Wild Wings, Burger King, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Dennyâ€™s, Dunkinâ€™, Five Guys, IHOP, McDonaldâ€™s, KFC, Panda Express, Panera, Papa Johnâ€™s, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Subway, Taco Bell, Wendyâ€™s, White Castle, and more. GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT Burning questions? Delivery crisis? Grubhub customer support is here for you 24/7. *$0 delivery fees only apply to eligible delivery orders from Grubhub+ merchants that meet the subtotal minimum (before tax, tip, and fees) on the applicable menu page or otherwise indicated on the Grubhub platform. Additional fees may apply. 5% pickup credit applicable on eligible future pickup orders only and is calculated based on the qualifying order subtotal. Credit is not transferable, not redeemable for cash, expires 90 days after most recent credit is issued and is subject to restrictions. Grubhub+ is an automatically renewing membership service requiring recurring payments. After your free trial ends, your free trial will convert to a paid Grubhub+ membership and Grubhub will automatically charge you each month at the then-current rate (currently $9.99) plus tax until you cancel. See terms: https://lp.grubhub.com/legal/plus/
