summary: Shop and save from anywhere.

scraped_reviews.content: Generally, the app is really good. However, they recently added an update that shows you the price of your individual items in your cart with your discounts applied, such as having your redcard attached. I loved this as I could easily compare to other stores, but it seems they now have taken this away. I'm also upset that they got rid of the 1% back on purchases. I make many small purchases and never get up to what is required for the gift cards.

I just upgraded from the Galaxy S23 Ultra to the S25 Ultra. Now when I try to scan barcodes in the app to check prices and such, the scanner doesn't do anything and then I get an error box saying "An unexpected error occurred. Pease try again later." Since I work at target and use this feature when my MyDevice isn't working, this has caused some serious frustration. I've spent over an hour trying to troubleshoot the issue, made sure all permissions are given, etc. No luck. Just junk now.

My last review was from 2 years ago about how since the update I could not access my app. Well Target did it again. I'm completely locked out of my account now. I have no way to access my previous purchases, which includes shipping information that I need to know about. I have no way of signing in, even as a guest. It refused to do anything and all of my stuff is lost.

Garbage, Trash, Dumpster Fire I don't know any other way to describe it. Seven times since December 1st I have tried to order same day delivery/Pickup. None of the online quantities match the actual stock. Whether it's a app issue or a Target issue altogether, it's still an issue. Absolute waste of time and not to mention when you order for same day delivery they put double the amount on hold with your credit card so when they're out of stock you have multiple purchases on hold.

This app gets more confusing with every update. I used to use it to maintain a shopping list, but that is too difficult now. Why is my shopping list under "Buy Again?" Where did the "Making A List" option go? I can't find it. The extra click to choose between adding to my shopping list and my essentials is just annoying given I also can't find the my essentials list anywhere.

App is not user friendly at all. Complex, disorganized navigation. Takes way too long to find anything. Took me a good 5 minutes to find where the coupons were hidden. So many "deal" advertisements all over app, but no way to get to coupons without clicking through 7 different screens. Then when you try to apply coupon, app gives an error. I give up on Target. I have tried to place orders several times and there's always some issue. Not worth my time to fuss. stick with Amazon or Walmart

The app has more limited features than the site itself, and it even has popups, ads, and notification spam. The app's search function also does not work properly. It'll fail to find what you typed in and instead throw in slightly related other products among your search results. Not sure if Target's app is the victim of enshittification or has always been awful, but it's embarassingly useless in its current state.

I just downloaded the app to plan a potential trip. I can't even use it! It keeps forcing me to the location selection screen &, despite having location services fully open to the app, it won't pull up a single location & I can't exit the screen. The search function is fruitless as it just gives me an intrusive pop up error after EVERY character. You'd think a company that was struggling so much would have their tech dialed in to ensure accessibility. I will likely end up shopping elsewhere.

Used to be a decent app...now it's slow and clunky. Try and find an item at another store and it doesn't let you pick the store on the list to check inventory. And speaking of which, there inventory system must be awful bc what the app says and what is on the shelf rarely correlate. I agree with another review who said the Target employees (and higher-ups) obviously don't use the app bc it's pretty much junk.

Tonight there is a change in the app requiring me to indicate my preferred store. This is already in my Target Circle account. However, I cannot go any further in using the app until I put this information in their new module. When I entered the zip code, it didn't accept it. I tried entering the city, state, zip. The app is glitch and I couldn't even type the full information without an error pop up. It's very frustrating especially since that information is already in there.

So yeah, the app stinks. Ads are everywhere. Cluttered design. Poor search features full of junk 3rd party sellers, unable to default shipping instead of pick up, etc. The circle free shipping still has a minimum cut-off for lower priced items, which is lame. What's the point of paying for the membership fee if I still have to reach a minimum order amount?

Of the 4 items i attempted to scan, only 1 was recognized and it had no results. Seems to be a huge stepdown from the cartwheel application. Something is problematic with various text entry boxes. If you type to fast or use voice to text, they can't keep up and either stop or lose text. Can't move cursor position either.

1) Wallet section constantly asks to verify the account; says to "check this box" to reduce sign-ins ... but there is no box to check! 2) the "add a gift card" feature doesn't work - it shows one has been added, but then never is applied to your total. All in all, this is a pretty useless app except to view the weekly ads. I want to support Target, but the company makes it far too hard. My "Target runs" are fast turning into Walmart runs -- I never thought I'd say that.

I have used the Target circle app for many many years without problems. I particularly love the order for pickup. The last update has brought frustration upon frustration upon me. When I search it is super slow, sometimes never loading. When I try to add to cart, it often tells me that I have no internet connection and try again which isn't true as I'm on my home Wifi. There seems to also be a glitch with keeping me signed in when I'm only shopping not checking out.

the last update broke the app. even with location enabled it is asking you to select the store nearest to you and you cannot not do that and it keeps giving errors saying that can't search for a store. even before that you used to earn Circle points to be able to exchange for money off and that is super glitchy and half of the time doesn't show anything.

stop being confusing. you say "only 7 left at 'a particular store'" then when you try to add it to your cart it says "pick up not available", "delivery not available". the only option is shipping, which arrives 3 days from now. we are simply looking for a product we need and we're willing to give you our money, if you have it. sadly, your app only confuses. stop wasting our time.

Completely stopped working. Won't even let me see the home page, it keeps asking what my go to target is and when I try to search either nearby stores OR with a zip code, it says "Failed to look up a place for your input. Try again." I'm sure it has to do with an update to the app, but it's beyond me why their app development team allowed it to be pushed through if there were still bugs in the new update.

Terrible store experience. I saw a product with an advertised lower price for Target Circle members. I tried to purchase it at the advertised price, using my phone number at checkout, but was told by a staff member I had to download the app to get the price. I had to spend 10 minutes downloading this and getting it set up to purchase a product at the advertised price despite already being a long-term customer. After this bad experience I will be doing much less shopping at Target going forward.

First, this is an APP review, NOT store rating. Whether you love, hate or had bad STORE experiences -NOT an app issue- don't rate or review that here. App functionality: Item searching is frustrating, using correct descriptions. Added a registry, seems to be no way to add items to it other than from "suggestions" shown. Searched items have option "add to list", but not gift registry. Target customer service only told me to use the website. Why not fix the app instead of steering customers away?

Tried to install it quickly at the store to scan an item. God, it is so lame. Corporate geniuses want you to login into an account (can login as a guest but still), set up a home store, and share everything. By the time i could get the price i almost gave up. And the price in the app didn't match the price in the store by a lot. (40%)

All this App does is glitch & crash. I can't even get to my account after I was forced to delete & reinstall because all the searches kept glitching and wouldn't refresh. Now after logging in there is no way for me to choose "my store" and it won't let me get past the "choose a store option" and keeps throwing up an error. Even though "my store" should already be saved by default and there's no way around this step.

It's suddenly pushing a popup to select a store when I open the app that can't be closed. When I search for a zip code or city, it doesn't show any stores & I can't close the pop-up without picking a location, so the app is now unable to be used including the wallet. Without the wallet to easily use my target card & discounts, I'll go shop somewhere else!!!

Lots of weird bugs that should have been fixed long ago. The one that is currently irking me the most is that there is a dedicated "wallet" section of the app where you can supposedly add your Target Circle Credit/Debit card for easy payment. I have never been able to add my card. it doesn't even give me an error message I can reference, it simply pretends to add the card and then doesn't. Has been this way as long as I've had the app.

No longer able to view credit limit or other details on website or app, when you have the app it's almost impossible to connect to the desktop site it just keeps opening the app. Also, Please bring back the ability to search previous purchases with a search, it used to say buy again when you would type something you already bought. This is a problem for book lovers, also if you just weren't sure if you tried something before. loved that feature!

Stop making it so difficult with every 'app update' to find Circle Deals. I do not need to see every single item Target (and sponsors) has on sale within every category; I just want to see applicable Circle deals and don't feel like I should have to go through several more steps to find them. The more of my time it takes, the less I'm willing to shop there!

Why does the screen keep going to sleep while I'm actively scanning items? It's so aggravating! I can't scan more than 2 MAYBE 3 items before the screen goes to sleep on me. It actually seems to go to sleep FASTER while using the app than by just setting the phone down. What's the point? Also, it still shows you ads while opening, which is really awkward while people are waiting to check out, and I'm just standing at the register watching an ad. Thanks, Target. Your devs should be fired.

Still bugged out. Can't view any reviews. Items that should show up in the search don't. I had to have someone send me a link because the app refused to show a particular item even after searching for it verbatim. It's like the app is hiding items from you, which is really weird. Almost renders the app useless but the website isn't any better. Update: The same, but now it won't let me switch store locations.

No price matching AmazonFresh. I enabled the option in the app to get cash back, but the cashier did not give me any. I added two gift cards to the app and scanned it at the self-checkout. My Target Red Card was charged for the full amount. Customer service was unable to fix it. They couldn't even get a return to work. There is no way to share a receipt from the app. When viewing in-store receipts in the app, sometimes items will just show as "Missing Item Info", not even showing an amount paid.

-I have to choose My List each time I open the app. previously I did not and that was preferable -Target is an amplified grocery store, not an Amazon. I do not want or need multiple shopping lists options. I esp don't want to pick a list EVERY time I hit Add to List. -if you MUST add this feature, you need to give us the option to remove or edit My Usuals so we can have one list. Right now mine has 6 items, 3 of which don't exist anymore. 2 are items I added by mistake. Not useful.

I have been getting same-day deliveries from Target for years. I work from home and cannot have my cell phone readily next to me or if I'm off and want to sleep in I prefer not to be interrupted. Even when you select the option to not substitute and for the Shopper not to text you, once you submit the order it automatically resets it to instructing the Shopper to text you. This started happening I want to say about 2 to 3 months ago and no updates have fixed the issue!! ANNOYING!

Deals don't always work. Buy 4 purchases of $75, Buy 3 $150 purchases.. Do this, do that.. Earn gift cards. Except sometimes you do it, and it DOESN'T validate. I made purchases one time to specifically get the rewards only to be told by the help center they couldn't help me. I made the purchases. Those are recorded clear as day. But all they could offer was I wasn't within the "required dates". Nope! The offer was ON my APP. You can't tell me the offer is invalid. Don't chase the rewards.

I should not have to give a company (with a proven record of being hacked) my data by setting up an account to use an app to scan barcodes because you all decided to not properly list the prices of items in store and decided to remove barcode scanners in store. I do not require an account to shop in your marginally overpriced stores, I choose to because of convenience, and it is inconvenient to be required to create an account to price items. Do and be better you ghouls.

ever since they got rid of the designated registry app, there's no way to add items to a registry from the app. There's no button to do that anywhere. within the registry section, if you click "add items" it will give a button to add the suggested items, but if you click on sections within that or search, your only option is add to cart. it's very frustrating & has caused me to turn to Amazon registry for Christmas & child birthdays, even though I like target's children's clothing.

Not so much the app, but the ordering process. All 3 things delayed, the last one delayed several times the day before shipping. First representative lied about opening a case, second hug up on me when I asked for confirmation about the order just being canceled, third representative finally took care of it, and I checked to make sure. Horrible customer service experience all around, deleting immediately.

I miss the days when I could just add the Circle deals I actually wanted and could use. Then, it changed and they added most of them automatically so it cluttered my deals. Now, with this new update, I can't even locate Target Circle. WHY MAKE IT SO FREAKING COMPLICATED??!! It is NOT user friendly, and it makes me want to NOT shop Target at all. PLEASE UNCOMPLICATE IT!!

A decent way to see what current offers and coupons are, and Target wallet is a far more efficient way to pay. But quite annoyingly, the app signs you out of the wallet function sort of randomly. eg I will make sure that I'm logged in in the parking lot of the store (persistent login lasts for months). Then when I go to check out after shopping 15 minutes later, the session has since expired rather than being extended by my using it. Somebody needs to work on their ux

This app went downhill so quickly. It used to be one of the more accurate, but now it's just frustrating. Also just refusing to even let you SEE the checkout page until you're promising to spend at least $30 is just not where it's at. I'll just get the -single item- I need from Walmart instead, thanks.

I tried setting up auto payments through the app through and the website and I didn't go through so I missed a payment by mistake because I thought it was auto paying and then they reported it to my credit all of its got up the mistake was told they did not remove it and all of that stuff is not easy to set up very frustrated. I had issues at the beginning with all of it also sitting on the phone for hours trying to figure stuff out because it wasn't straightforward.

This app and the Target website are frequently half-broken. Lots of times I've done a search for a common product like trail mixbonly for the results to be blank, and even trying to click through to different categories also gets blank results. Trying to change stores for delivery or pickup is also broken at these times, and there's no solution except to wait for it to randomly start working again. Definitely don't rely on being able to order things by a certain time; an outage can last hours.

You can't even browse now without signing into an account (one more password to track). I just want to check on a product before driving over to the physical store, rather than payong for shipping and waiting on it. Here's the 1 star rating: If you don't sign in you can't exit the app, it just keeps cycling back to the sign-in screen. That's arrogant of the developer. No thank you. I went into phone settings and killed the app.

Deals are current, it's user friendly, and easy to find what you want. I only wish you could filter out things when shopping for strictly delivery or pick up. Its annoying to find what I am looking for then to find out they don't even have it available online OR I am just looking for what's available in store near me, I don't want to see online exclusives or out-of-stock items. It gets a bit tedious. It's possible that filter feature exists, I just didn't see it. Overall, it's a great app, tho.

The app was very slow and crashed several times, but it allowed me to order items with curbside pick-up. A couple of hours after ordering, I got an email saying the item was no longer available. I had to re-order it at another Target that's further away ... I hope this one actually comes through with it. This was my first time using the app.

UPDATE: IDK what's wrong with it but it just says "something went wrong" when I try to sign in or create an account. If I try to continue as guest it doesn't do anything. Can't do anything. So easy to track, subscribe, update orders. One time a package wasn't delivered and I just clicked the button at the bottom of the delivery receipt and told them. They sent another one right over, easy as that. The ease of this app is the thing you need right now.

This app could use a lot of improvement. There is no option for changing your whole cart's "shipping status". You have to change each item one at a time if you want to change something like a store location. Coupons are confusing in the app. Also, every time an item is out of stock on a pick up, I try to change to free shipping and it won't allow it. Highly dissatisfied with the app. It has a long ways to go and none of your employees can help me with it either.

Easy to use and items have isle numbers, so it's easy to find the item in store if you want to look at it before you buy it. Ordering is super easy and there are a few options (ship, deliver, pick up). Discounts and cash back are nice! You can scan the app at the register or use your phone number so that you can get your savings. The only drawback is the search engine is not very intuitive. You have to use an exact word from the item you're looking for to find it.

The app has issues. You can load your groceries and i have a habit of doing that the day before i plan to submit the purchase. I wake up and suddenly the app says everything foodwise is out of stock. EVERYTHING! That has to be an error. So i search each item to find they're available but i cannot add them to a pickup purchase. What is the point here. If i have to go inside, I'm not going to process anything for a pickup order. Fine, but half your coupons and discounts are pickup orders only.

Love the target app, always score good deals and is easy to use. Love that you can scan stuff at the store and you can see if there are any discounts. NEW REVIEW Sadly my app has been useless for the past week or so, I cannot look at items i want to see. It always says there's an error loading. I have turned my phone on and off, Uninstalled the app, signed out but nothing works. PLEASE fix this.

App Errors, Can't Purchase Anything!!!! The only way to purchase with drive up is through app. Yet every item I click on in the app tells me there is an error loading. I can use the web and order just fine, but can't select drive up pick up. You need to fix your crappy app so people don't have to go in store for a couple of items during a freaking pandemic!!!!

Its been almost 2 weeks... No matter what I do, it still force closes like crazy. I'm a red card member, I usually do my holiday shopping here, but the app won't stay open long enough for me to even click anything. I've uninstalled, re-installed, cleared the cache, force stopped it. Today was the only day anything worked, for a whole 2 hours. Now I have items in my cart I can't access or buy bc the app won't open. I called the 800 # provided, there's no prompt for help with the app. Super disappointed customer here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley - This is not what we'd expect and we apologize for your experience. Try force stopping the app, restarting your device and giving things another try. You may also want to try toggling from Wi-Fi to cellular data or vice versa (data rates may apply). If issues persist, please let us know at 800-591-3869. Thanks! - Shelly

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst shopping app I have ever used. Fixes needed: do not make me click on type of pick up or shipping on each and every of my 32 items. There should be option to pick 1 type as a default for all. Second, I added Freebox promo code, which can't ship to my address. I do all my shopping on line, even Walmart ships to my address. Complete scam of free items. I called customer service and it took her 30+ minutes to figure it out. She was great, but 30 minutes?

title: Shadowgun Legends: Online FPS
description: Enjoying online shooters and multiplayer gun games? Would you like to discover a whole new universe, kill some nasty aliens and drink in a spacebar? Then this online game is the right choice! â˜… Award-winning Action First-person Shooter â˜… The universe is under attack and the last line of defense are the Shadowguns - legendary warriors, heroes and showmen. Fight against the alien invasion in the sci-fi world of Shadowgun Legends. Embrace your destiny and join the action in the epic story campaign, competitive PvP or co-op games! Show the galaxy who is the ultimate shooter and become a Legend! â˜… Immersive Online Multiplayer â˜… Bring your friends to an intense Co-op available for every mission, dungeon and arena. Join a guild or make one of your own and play multiplayer shooting games together! Feeling social? Visit Brno, our fallout town and meet new friends in the hub or in the bar! Apex of your adventures await! â˜… Thrilling Story Campaign â˜… Shoot aliens and fight for the survival of humankind in the epic story campaign in hundreds of missions spanning across 3 diverse planets. Every mission is playable in co-op and loaded with tons of action adventures and loot! â˜… PvP Multiplayer Battles â˜… Compete in PvP multiplayer game modes. Challenge friends to modern combat in a 1v1 duel or join a team in various tactical 4vs4 multiplayer games! Progress through the competitive leaderboards and reach the apex of Legends! â˜… Epic PvE Looter Shooter with Raids and Arenas â˜… Join forces with friends and shoot giant bosses for glory and legendary loot together. Fight and defeat the alien threat in War Games Arenas and Special Dungeons only on your mobiles! True Hardcore Shooting PvE FPS Experience! â˜… 700+ Unique Super Futuristic Gunsâ˜… Choose from a variety of guns including Pistols, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Rocket Launchers. Pick the right gun and unleash mayhem! â˜… Endless Customization Options â˜… Collect over 1000 futuristic armour pieces. Try out different Paint Cans, Skins and Stickers. Build your own unique looking armour sets! Choose your style â€“ show halo or horns, and have fun! â˜… Top of the modern controller compatible games â˜… Choose between touch control or an enhanced virtual joystick! Our unique FPS controls system is approved by millions of players worldwide. Gamepads support included! Easy controls with auto-fire shooting allows you to focus solely on your survival. â˜… Become a Legend â˜… Progress through the Fame System that rewards your every action. The more you play, the more famous you are - and the more the world reacts to your actions! Fulfil your destiny and become legendary! â˜… Apex of the High-End Mobile Graphics â˜… We push the frontiers of what is possible on mobile devices! Shadowgun Legends is a breath-taking f2p online shooter with great graphics that blurs the lines between console and mobile gaming. â˜… Dedication to Quality â˜… At DECA Games, weâ€™ve always challenged ourselves to push the frontiers of mobile FPS online games to the console-quality. Millions of players have been blown away by our innovative approach, cutting edge graphics and precise FPS controls. We have been developing the best FPS shooting games since 2010. The authors of Dead Trigger, Dead Trigger 2, Unkilled and Shadowgun War Games, first-person action shooters downloaded by more than 200M players, we bring you this ultimate multiplayer free-to-play shooter!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoying online shooters and multiplayer gun games? Would you like to discover a whole new universe, kill some nasty aliens and drink in a spacebar? Then this online game is the right choice!

â˜… Award-winning Action First-person Shooter â˜…
The universe is under attack and the last line of defense are the Shadowguns - legendary warriors, heroes and showmen. Fight against the alien invasion in the sci-fi world of Shadowgun Legends. Embrace your destiny and join the action in the epic story campaign, competitive PvP or co-op games! Show the galaxy who is the ultimate shooter and become a Legend!

â˜… Immersive Online Multiplayer â˜…
Bring your friends to an intense Co-op available for every mission, dungeon and arena. Join a guild or make one of your own and play multiplayer shooting games together! Feeling social? Visit Brno, our fallout town and meet new friends in the hub or in the bar! Apex of your adventures await!

â˜… Thrilling Story Campaign â˜…
Shoot aliens and fight for the survival of humankind in the epic story campaign in hundreds of missions spanning across 3 diverse planets. Every mission is playable in co-op and loaded with tons of action adventures and loot!

â˜… PvP Multiplayer Battles â˜…
Compete in PvP multiplayer game modes. Challenge friends to modern combat in a 1v1 duel or join a team in various tactical 4vs4 multiplayer games! Progress through the competitive leaderboards and reach the apex of Legends!

â˜… Epic PvE Looter Shooter with Raids and Arenas â˜…
Join forces with friends and shoot giant bosses for glory and legendary loot together. Fight and defeat the alien threat in War Games Arenas and Special Dungeons only on your mobiles! True Hardcore Shooting PvE FPS Experience!

â˜… 700+ Unique Super Futuristic Gunsâ˜…
Choose from a variety of guns including Pistols, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Rocket Launchers. Pick the right gun and unleash mayhem!

â˜… Endless Customization Options â˜…
Collect over 1000 futuristic armour pieces. Try out different Paint Cans, Skins and Stickers. Build your own unique looking armour sets! Choose your style â€“ show halo or horns, and have fun!

â˜… Top of the modern controller compatible games â˜…
Choose between touch control or an enhanced virtual joystick! Our unique FPS controls system is approved by millions of players worldwide. Gamepads support included! Easy controls with auto-fire shooting allows you to focus solely on your survival.

â˜… Become a Legend â˜…
Progress through the Fame System that rewards your every action. The more you play, the more famous you are - and the more the world reacts to your actions! Fulfil your destiny and become legendary!

â˜… Apex of the High-End Mobile Graphics â˜…
We push the frontiers of what is possible on mobile devices! Shadowgun Legends is a breath-taking f2p online shooter with great graphics that blurs the lines between console and mobile gaming.

â˜… Dedication to Quality â˜…
At DECA Games, weâ€™ve always challenged ourselves to push the frontiers of mobile FPS online games to the console-quality. Millions of players have been blown away by our innovative approach, cutting edge graphics and precise FPS controls. We have been developing the best FPS shooting games since 2010. The authors of Dead Trigger, Dead Trigger 2, Unkilled and Shadowgun War Games, first-person action shooters downloaded by more than 200M players, we bring you this ultimate multiplayer free-to-play shooter!
summary: Multiplayer online games, RPG shooter with PvP, Co-Op and Epic story campaign

scraped_reviews.content: This game is great. I love exploring the map and shooting at aliens. Decent story plot well. I refuse to put any $ toward the games I play and the in game gear keeps steady upgrade as I level up. Only thing I would change is most of the firearms shoot automatically at the badguys. If I want to fire by myself then I must switch to my secondary weapon which is usually a sniper rifle or rocket launcher. But this game is pretty fun ðŸ˜Ž

all these years of playing on and off and I still love it. super graphics (consistently updated), team play is a blast, lots of weapons, and there are allot of really good people in the clans. I do wish some new weapons and maps would come out, these are getting stale. all things considered that is not a deal breaker.

Great game but if you don't add to it and open stuff up and make the lvl higher past 27 you will hurt since Destiny Rising came out . They jump , slide and more . This game doesn't have that . Takes money to make money . Also to many bugs and glitches . If you don't add and fix Destiny Rising will destroy you simple as that . The was Battlefield 6 is destroying COD is the same way that will happen to the game if there's nothing new .

Great game, Great Graphics, controls could be better but are definitely workable and not difficult either. The maps, the aliens, the missions, the language love it, it's super enticing, feels like halo meets borderlands. Only downside I have is that clans are all full, so no joining and or creating and getting members and the other issue I have is the war games lacks hard in finding players to match with for missions and dungeons. frustrating as it's one of the actual missions

THIS GAME? WOW! I never thought I'd be writing another review. For me it feels like HALO. I've downloaded this game on EVERY PHONE I've owned in the past 5 years! And yes it's true, you can pay to play and reach higher levels and more Skins faster, or just GRIND PLAY this game and actually EARN your way up as a better player. It feels much more rewarding in the end. Still, buy something in the IN-APP PURCHASE and support the Developers. It must have taken an ARMY to make this game. I LOVE IT!

it's a fun game actually been playing for awhile, but game keeps restarting over and over, forcing me to keep doing the same missions over and over until it stops, it's not my wifi, because I'm constantly connected, I think it's a bug in the game, the game is trying to execute a specific command, but it's glitched, so it restarts the game to try to fix it.

It's enjoyable so far. It has simple controls and is easy to get started and understand what is going on. Most FPS games are bloated and complicated, but this one is not. Lots of loot, upgrades, and an interesting skill tree. I'm looking forward to experiencing more of the game. The only issue so far is that if I minimize the game or watch an ad for extra xp or something, my Bluetooth earbuds no longer work with in-game audio. I have to disable and re-enable my Bluetooth connection.

Really enjoy this game, has actual varied missions, doesn't force me to buy anything, no "energy" bs that will only let you play for a certain period of time, this game wants you to keep playing it. Good graphics, and the one thing I love, is an actual video game. It's not a free to play game that constantly reminds you of sales, or limits you on free items. I usually hate free to play games, but I'm actually really enjoying this one.

Okay, I have only one issue as of right now. ADD A CHAT! Oh my god, how is there no chat/compatibility with a headset in this game? I was running the dungeon, got to the part with 1-2-3-4 panels, our team was running pretty nicely, until, OF COURSE, my teamate hadn't figured out the puzzle, but I Had. Worst of all, he just kept hitting random panels whenever I would hit one. I tried shooting the panel, to tell him where to go and where to look to understand my reasoning, but he just went ahead and shot me right back just because he has no common sense. Even if he had gone to the proper panel, it's a time puzzle, we couldn't just hit them in order, we had to time them right. This is a straight deal breaker for a game like this, wth. Fix this, I'm not spending another hour in a dgn because people are stupid.

well the game is great to be honest. Just run out of stuff to do within a week so if your looking for game to play for a week only than this is your game. Its fun because you can play with friends and etc. BUT there is so little to do and in so little time. The only fun part is leveling to level 20. Once you get there the game loses its fun. You're basically stuck collecting legendary guns which isn't hard to do at all. I got more to complain but character limit reached. Also Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions of the game. Have you tried participating in our events? They are fun and offer new content regularly. Regarding the rank, I understand that most games let you level up,  but in Shadowgun Legends it is all about fame. By collecting fame you can become Legendary Shadowgun ;)

Buck Andrews

scraped_reviews.content: I only just recently got a phone that can play games on it (for the first time ever, btw: I've never played phone games before). So I've done a lot of browsing the Play store. From what I've seen of Shadowgun in the hour or so I've played: one of the best looking games I've ever seen on a phone , and very accessable control-wise. The combat is fun and easy to understand. Where I'm getting hit a little is how much info dumping there is to start out. It seems there's a lot to learn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Zach,

we truly appreciate your honest and constructive review. If you have any questions, please, feel free to ask.

Have a nice day

scraped_reviews.content: This is my all time favorite mobile game. I'm not one to live on mobile games or to stay sucked into them but this one has me hooked. Everyone is friendly and helpful. I've had issues with disconnects from other players and it messing up dungeons and arena. If possible in a new update..I think if someone is disconnected and is kicked out, the other players should still be able to continue. I'm waiting on chat and messaging options more campaign missions and the tattoo parlor. Still amazing game!

More please!! It's one of the best mobile games. Tons to do for free. My only complaints are the chests you can't remove from your inventory and materials and grinding becoming useless in the end game. They could do a lot with this, I've had tons of ideas while playing that can take this game to a new level. Overall it's worth trying. I love it, just ran out of reasons to grind.

Superb shooter RPG game similar to Borderlands and Destiny although it has plenty of unique elements to make it stand out, such as it's price (free) and it's for mobile but has console quality graphics, coop, multiplayer and friend system. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys shooter games with some strategy built-in. Does not require real money to play or do well in the game, but it is difficult (not impossible) to make your avatar look cool without spending some cash. With easy to use and surprisingly in-depth combat and skills, and with pleanty of loot to collect and earn, this is a great game and I look forward to future updates and additions. A big thank you to the developers! Keep up the great work!

this is by far the best shooter on the market, we're talking top quality graphics, easy controls, smooth matchmaking. this game has a real destiny feel with a central hub, co OP every mission you want never need to play alone but could if desired. there is independent armor pieces for custom looks make yourself really stand out. tons of missions to do. this is not a pay to play game but the option is always there if you should choose too. all round perfect.

Only just started but so far it's very fun and seems to have a lot of heart in it. However I do have to mention the monetization; as with all mobile games, if you're not pay to play you're gonna be navigating through somewhat optional ads. You will also be partially restricted with inventory capacity and things of that nature. Overall I give it a solid 4, definitely worth playing if you're a fan of destiny or halo. I've been having a lot of fun with it personally.

Phenomenal. Fun, addicting and for what it is the best I've come across. The development team really hit the ball out the park on this gem. Im glad I came across it. Great work couldn't ask for much more. Maybe voice chat could be tweaked alittle because the time I used it the connection seemed laggy and I couldn't understand the other player. One more thing the gold or whatever that currency is needs to more available, somewhere, maybe hard dungeons give it out idk but that's my only issue.

well, in my case it's hard to enjoy it fully, and I really can't buy anything to enhance my experiance, hope to change that one day, but overall I would highly recommend it! if you like destiny and borderlands, this is a game for you, because it's both, Destiny like world, but with a borderlands style of writing, it isn't a over the top, you are the only hope for humans, etc as many of the games in this genre are like. you kill aliens for the enjoyment of the masses.. you are not a hero.

Great first person shooter for mobile. This game may be one of the best. However, dont think you're going to complete one of the offers for free gold and receive what was promised. Gold offers are a total waste of time, you may find yourself with tons of useless apps and pointless spam in your email from trying to complete them. This game fun to play but really just a never ending commercial. Props to the marketing department!

Enjoying this game so far. Still a low level. Haven't felt compelled to spend any money which is good. Couple things this game could use is melee and a grenade option. Also the heavy weapon fire button is right where the joystick is, I hit it accidentally almost every time. Would be nice to be able to customize the layout a little. Looking forward to progressing in this game. Perfect mix of FPS and RPG especially on a phone.

You guys really need to relax with how you approach the quests. Everytime you get done with one side mission, 3 more pop up making it overwhelming and not as fun to play. There's no point in grinding for in game currensy because it can't buy you anything cool. You guys should implement free roam maps where players can have pvp, battle aliens, trade, or do whatever. This game has so much potential but it's not being used.

Pretty good! But I have one problem... Idk if it's my internet or it's the game, but sometimes (not all the time) my screen blacks out! In the hub I only see stores, names of players and my stuff. I can't see my character or others. And When I joined a duel with an opponent... I kept dying cause I couldn't see anything! The only thing I could do is hear the character killing me and hearing myself move around! Please check this out I hate having weird random blackouts! Thanks!

This is the best fps/mobile game I ever played !! I can literally play it all day long, theres so much to do. So many skills and weapons also to try different setups. It kinda reminds me of destiny or warframe on consoles/pc. The game has been out a year or more, I wish I had found it sooner lol. Another great thing about the game is its completely free! You can get legendaries gear from playing the game, it doesn't make you pay like other games. Awesome!

After the tutorial, whenever I typed a name, it says it is not Available no matter what I type. Loved what is saw so far though. Edit: managed to get it working by creating a new character. Fix this issue so we can use our old characters, then you get 5 stars. Other than that, I absolutely love this game. Perfect fps for mobile. Maybe add more weapons types, and a crouch button. I would also appreciate more ways to get gold for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're very sorry you've encountered this issue! Please contact us from in-game or at https://support.decagames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and include your account details. Include your username and the email connected, the device you use and when do you encounter the issue. We'll do our best to resolve it. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun game. It's a co-op style or solo fps shooter game. Nice game for killing time. The menus take time to learn how to navigate but once you understand it the buttons make sense. Extremely easy in the beginning but don't worry the game progresses in difficulty as you rank up. Pvp mode becomes available at a certain rank. Guilds are available but not necessary. Interesting game for sure. Definitely check it out and see if it's for you. Have an awesome day thanks for reading my review.

I've been playing Shadowgun Legends on and off for years. Even though I'm giving it a 5 star I do have a few complaints. Strong boxes. If you get a strong box that requires a key good luck. Not only can you not remove them from your inventory the keys are only accessible if you use real money of spend WEEKS grinding ads. Secondly, loot progression is very slow after you hit a certain lvl. Otherwise it's a great game and very unique.

Garbage. Constant crashing mid-dungeon. Controls are weak. PvP matching is the worst I have ever played. I am not just another gamer....I spent money on this game so I can tell you with confidence...DONT SPEND MONEY....ITS NOT WORTH IT. Spend 20 minutes in a dungeon, just to get randomly recycled either back to the hub or previous dungeon checkpoint.....is NOT what we call "good game mechanics"....this game needs a ton of work before anyone should spend any money on it.

It's an OK game. You can tell some real effort was put into it- but it's very slow and hard to control. No matter how you play the game the sensitivities will always be too slow and clunky. And the gameplay isn't any better. The four main things you do are: Aim, Shoot, Move, and Reload. I would not recommend this game as a fast-paced fps. Maybe try Pub-G or Call of duty.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Ayden,

thank you for your feedback. You can actually reload your weapon manually even with autofire â€“ tap and hold the weapon icon. You can also toggle autofire in the game settings - turn the "Auto fire" to ON or OFF.

scraped_reviews.content: Game was pretty fun, I genuinely enjoyed myself. But when I got my very first legendary box, and was exited to see what I got. I made the disheartening discovery that it requires pay to win keys instead of opening as usual. Instant uninstall. Shameful practice. Allow players to actually enjoy their legendary drops or there will be very low player sustain. The game will fail, inevitably. What a disapointment.

Overall the game is good. By far the best shooter I played on mobile, and I'd say dead trigger 2 is second to this. If I had any complaints, I don't like having to play multiplayer to get those last two skill points. I also would like there to be more skill points per level. Limiting us to one specific route feels unrewarding and lacking variety. Now for PvP I understand that, but for solo there could be more skill points. I don't understand the change to the way skills are placed either. 7.5

This is a surprisingly good shooter. I just wish that earning gold wasn't a slog though. Like I get it that it's a free to play game, but come on! At least let gold be earned through playing missions. Pretty much the only way to get gold is to watch three daily ads, which gives you a measly 5 gold. And you NEED 80 gold just to open a single loot crate! There's another currency that you do get for completing missions, however, there isn't a whole lot to do with it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

you can earn some free gold by watching ads or completing free gold offers, which will quickly earn you gold for a key to open them.We recommend to not pick them up if they don't want them in their inventory. If you make any in-game purchase, even the cheapest one, your inventory increases its slots to 300 and this change is permanent.

scraped_reviews.content: Hello Developers. I hope you see this review. You all did a great job on your game and it's fantastic. I love it. However, the game doesn't contain any Jump Button which is Okay if you guys don't add it but can you please add a Melee Button in Close Range? Because enemies can Melee me when I'm close to them so I want the advantage to melee them as well at close range. Over all everything is Great about this game. Keep up the good work.

This is a very fun shoot-and-loot style game with lots of different dungeons, missions, and ways to play. There are a few things to note: you need to buy anything from the shop with real money to unlock all of your inventory space. Your main inventory is managable but the in-game backpack usually has you sacrificing items in large missions. The pvp matchmaking system also needs some work, Im usually paired with players too strong or much weaker than myself. Definitely worth your time though.

Game still needs a lot of work since the last time I played it, especially with it's connectivity issues, bugs, good lord the pay to win. The game itself is amazing. If only they didn't make it mobilize-d gaming (cash robbing) I still think it could actually be a good game for people to genuinely enjoy, if you only didn't make it into something to gain you more money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, our monetization if focused on cosmetic items instead of blocking any parts of the game behind paywalls or time gates. Also, you can get free gold by watching ad videos, if you want. You can play the whole game easily and without any restrictions. On top of that, we have added the Tapjoy offer wall to provide another way how to get gold.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a graphically impressive shooter for a mobile game. It's got glitchy issues here and there, but they try to make sure you get everything you pick up in your backpack. Lost earned equipment going missing has not been an issue. I suggest buying the $5 pack at least since it gives you 4 more spaces in your backpack and 280 extra inventory slots for all that sweet loot. Which you'll get lots of if you do the arena, co-op, and pvp. So far I'm digging it and have played quite a bit.

The game is really fun! It's like an fps mmorpg. Though I would like it if there are more movements available when you are shooting, because the character always walk slowly in a direction that was inputted. Lots of the gear in the game can only be purchased with a certain game currency which you must buy with real money. The majority of good gears are basically a must buy with real money. It is a shame that this good game is that way. The animation of the character can be a bit weird.

I've been playing this game for a few weeks now and have gotten to level 24 so far, and it's incredible! It's very hard to play with just the phone, I use a Razor controller and it plays just as good as a console game. There's no ads aside from rewards, this game is honestly at the same quality level of PC Steam games I've played before and I'm continually amazed that it's FREE! I have spent some real money, but for the most part you don't have too in order to advance just to unlock cooler stuff

I stopped playing this around Dec due to the lack of new content and persistent bugs. This was my go-to game!! ðŸ˜« Reinstalled, but right outta the gate my very first match was cut short because of bugs. This was in silver. The aliens were frozen in place. The one other player w/ me saw the same thing. I think I joined a match in progress, but it was enough for me to uninstall once again. Guess I'm going back to cheaterland(CODm)ðŸ˜±, instead of staying in bugville, for my mobile gaming fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are aware that Mimir missions are still bugged. The issue is more complicated than we first thought, therefore we have to solve that with an update. We already working on it. Thank you so much for your patience

scraped_reviews.content: This is simply a great game, it does get repetitive and the grind to get to level 27 (max level) is super long. But I'd be disappointed if it was that easy, it almost reminds me of a mini Destiny game, some of the enemies seem kinda similar to but give it a shot it a great game that you can connect a Bluetooth controller to(try it). Update: game is good and runs decently but it definitely needs a lot more content it's hard to grind a game with not much to offer in terms of high level activities

I love this game! The game play is super smooth, rarely lags, great user interface and weapon arsenal, like the game really is freaking awesome. I give 4 stars only bc I have one single complaint through the whole game: You can't drop items out of your inventory. You can sell the vast majority of it to clear the space. But there are these special "item boxes" you pick up and they sit in your inventory until you get a key to open them. I have 8 slots taken up bc I can't get rid of them.

This game is incedibly dazzling! I like the gameplay, but it could really use some updating. When you shoot a lot of the time it doesn't even register, and no this is NOT an internet issue, I play at 20-30 ms, and I really want this to be fixed. The graphics are great, but I wish you could be able to adjust them more freely such as having a textures option, anti aliasing option, shadow option, and effects option. Lastly, the controls. The controls are great.

This is a fun game. Reminds me of Destiny, Borderlands and other shoot & loot games. The controls are also very mobile friendly. A lot of mobile shooters I've played it's hard to aim and hit targets. But in this game there's an autoshoot feature that causes your character to automatically shoot once you are aiming at a target. This allows you to focus more on dodging attacks and aiming instead of contorting your fingers to aim, shoot, and move at the same time. Fun game! Definitely worth a try

It's one of the best games I've played with good graphics and gameplay with wonderful controls. There is good customization for your character and good guns, and also multiplayer. I would rate this a 5 star if It didn't have too much bugs/glitches. for example, in the multiplayer, some missions stop for no reason, if that happens you can't finish the multiplayer. would rate 5 if you guys fix some bugs. thx

Easily the most elaborate and engaging FPS in the mobile platform. There is a multiplayer aspect, but the side missions and campaign are a heavy focus. The "menu" in the game is actually a small town square where you pick your missions and trade loot! It's a unique and pleasurable experience, for sure, but my main pull is the 100% compatibility with my mobile controller! You can even map all the buttons, and there's never a reason to touch the screen. Beautifully done.

This is an awesome mobile game. Great graphics, smooth play, and easy controls. Even the pvp seems to be balanced. It however gets four stars for two reasons. 1) It doesn't take long to reach the low level cap. 2) I'm ok with having to pay gold to unlock certain boxes. I've bought gold because I felt the devs deserve it. But to unlock a gold box with rl money only to get paint or a sticker is a slap in the face. Take those out and you would get 5 stars easy!

Not bad. Pretty awesome graphics and controls are simple. I like the skill tree a lot. The only things I think would make this better is if there are harder difficulties with bosses or something that makes it so that really awesome gear drops. Or maybe make it an event of some sort. Also would be cool to find more hidden gear chests. Maybe make it so that you have to search the map a bit more. Maps are a bit simplistic as of yet. Also, why not make it so that we can buy bag space with credits?

The game glitches out when in the middle of a match at times. In wargames on the waves of enemies, it glitched out and reset right at the end of the game and I didnt get any loot from it that I acquired during the game. It is an awesome game overall but that glitch needs fixed. I would like for there to be more level content also, it seems like 20 is easy to reach and would be better if we can continue raising our levels. I will change my review when the glitch is fixed or items obtained stay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Michael,

we are currently focused to fix the issues and polish the game. The nasty issue which you mentioned is one of the top priorities on our list. It should be fixed soon. Thank you for your patience. Currently, there is no information about the level cap that we can share. 

With regards
Ryac MFG

scraped_reviews.content: Fun, silly, mobile shooter with personality. The only thing that's keeping it from the final two stars is the fact that those boxes that require keys take up precious inventory space. Either give us the ability to get rid of them, or give them their own separate space. Constant reminder to spend money is not something I want to see when I'm trying to make space for some equipment. Other than that, fun game to play and pass the time. I can see myself casually sticking with it.

The game is amazing! Just really hard to play it because of the control scheme. Please add more customization to the control scheme ,please. Right now there is only one option to choose from and that is you can only use the RIGHT SIDE of the screen to move your character. I know the majority of people play this style. I use the style known as Southpaw, which is the use of your left hand or left thumb to look around your surroundings. Other then that I would have gave it a 5 STAR.

I had a great time with the campaign; this game feels very much like a mobile Destiny. It's not terribly varied, but that's forgivable. My problem, is the fact it's undeniable to say it's a Pay to Win. Of course it is, it's free and the devs need to eat. If that's the case though, balance the multiplayer matches, and maybe look into adding a join in progress feature, because the dungeons are riddled with disconnects that make this game bland, and boring by endgame. I wish I could say I love it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
In any PVP mode,players are balanced so that the fights are fair and square.Players are scaled to have 1 power, regardless of their characterâ€™s power.Perks on their equip remain active as well as skills that they are using. Players may disconnect for many reasons due to the online nature of our game, it cannot be completely avoided.

title: Uber Eats: Food and Grocery
description:
Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy including pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donuts, and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favorite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For $9.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off orders over $15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over $35 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app. 

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favorite drug stores, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or diapers, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. Thatâ€™s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVORITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Little Caesars, Buffalo Wild Wings, Papa Johns, Shake Shack, Dominoâ€™s Pizza, Nandoâ€™s, Burger King, CAVA, A&W, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Dunkin', IHOP, KFC, McDonald's, Panda Express, Panera, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Sonic, Starbucks, Subway, Sweetgreen, Taco Bell, Tim Hortons, Wendy's, Five Guys, Jersey Mikes, White Castle, Jack in the Box, Outback Steakhouse, Red Lobster.

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocers such as Albertsons and SEG. Other delivery partners in the pharmacy, convenience, and retail space include CVS, Walgreens, 7-Eleven, Wawa, BevMo!, and Gopuff. Order from stores such as Walmart, Walgreens, CVS and Safeway. Other delivery partners include Petco, Drizly, and Favor.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.


AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join the thousands of others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favorites restaurants and schedule delivery

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, Rio de Janeiro, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. See full list of available countries in the app.
descriptionHTML:
Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal.
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy including pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donuts, and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favorite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For $9.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off orders over $15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over $35 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favorite drug stores, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or diapers, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats.

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. Thatâ€™s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
