Need better app if all this can't be fixed. Not considerate at all. Can't download any video at all even the shared is just not working. why why why. so not fairjjj

You all claim to know how to "protect young children".. well I downloaded this app.. and typed in "Game of the Thrones".. guess what I found? Daddies playing songs from the "GOTT show".. now if a friend from school tells my child to go check out GOTT and he does on your app.. and it looks "family friendly".. and decides to go into more intense research of the show on another browser.. and finds out the show is not family friendly.. Who is going to pay for lieing to my child? Can I sue Google?

title: BetterMe: Health Coaching
description:
Get workout and meal plans supported by human coaches, track your progress, and get bite-sized cognitive therapy tips to change your mindset.

FIVE REASONS TO INSTALL BetterMe:

1. Plan tailored to your goals

Whether your aim is to lose weight, build muscle, or stay fit, weâ€™ve got just the solution for you. Transform your body with a workout and meal plan that fits your busy schedule, preferences and lifestyle.

2. Stay on top of your wellbeing
From activity and calories to water intake and fasting, our trackers help you build new healthy habits. While in-depth stats over time help make them a part of your routine and show your progress!

3. 1-on-1 coaching 

Want to boost your results? Upgrade to 1-on-1 coaching to get support and daily check-ins from your personal coach. Stay accountable and on track to achieve lasting results with expert guidance every step of the way. Need to tweak your workout plan, get nutrition tips, or a dose of motivation? Just drop them a lineâ€”your coach has got your back!

4. Challenges for every goal

Push yourself with guided challenges in workouts, nutrition, and mindset. Whatever goal you have in mind, you'll get a structured plan that keeps you on track and delivers real results!

5. Start with your mind 
We believe that happiness starts from the inside out. Explore our chapters on nurturing a positive mindset. Just 10 minutes a day to rewire your negative thinking and set you up for success.

6. Get a 360Â° view of your wellness
Gain a better insight into your wellness journey with the BetterMe Fitness Tracker and Smart Scale. Monitor your sleep quality, daily steps, heart rate, and body composition to understand how your habits impact your overall well-being.

BetterMe is your go-to app for various workout types, easy-to-follow meal plans, and useful tips! 

Hereâ€™s how we help you succeed: 
Workout Plan: Get ready to get in better shape with short and effective workouts.
Delicious Meal Plans: Enjoy mouth-watering dishes chosen just for you! Our easy video recipes make cooking a breeze.
Intuitive Calorie Tracker: Keep tabs on your daily calorie and macros intake.
Personal Coach Feature: Youâ€™re never alone on this journey! You can upgrade to get professional guidance and support every step of the way.
Water and Step Trackers: Stay on top of your daily goals and keep your hydration and activity levels in check!
Workouts for Everyone: Whether you love yoga, running, or walking, we have over 800 workouts that fit your style and fitness level!

We offer flexible subscription plans on Google Play, so you can choose what works best for you. Please note that subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the free trial or the current subscription period. You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime through your Google Play account settings.

Accurate tracking with BetterMe Fitness Tracker*
Keep an eye on your health and fitness data with BetterMe Fitness Tracker. This tracker easily connects to BetterMe app, giving you insights on your steps, heart rate, and sleep.
BetterMe Fitness Tracker can display incoming call and SMS notifications from your paired smartphone, helping you stay connected and informed with just a quick glance, provided you grant the BetterMe App the necessary call or SMS permissions.
 
Terms of Use - https://betterme.world/terms
Privacy Policy - https://betterme.world/privacy-policy
Subscription Terms - https://betterme.world/subscription-terms

*BetterMe App exclusively supports BetterMe Fitness Tracker.

summary: Pilates, Calisthenics, Yoga

scraped_reviews.content: This app is really good for those who are getting back into exercise. Just be careful of what choice u pick when u say you're beginner, moderate, or do daily exercise. I thought i was moderate, but after doing these, I was like... I think I need to be a beginner. But it gets me going, energized, and I feel the workout the next day. The cost is the only issue I have with the app. I don't have the budget to spend $20+ on the app. I used the free trial. and boy i want to continue after the 14 days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoy our workouts! We are working hard to provide our customers with excellent services. We think that the cost is an adequate reflection of that. Our team has an idea of how to make your experience more pleasant. Please, do not hesitate to reach us at gethelp@betterme.world. BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: The first 15 days were great, with the exception of numerous updates. On the 16th day, an update failed to complete, and I had to uninstall the app. When I reinstalled, I was back at day 1. So I have started again, after communicating with support and receiving no resolution. The jury is still out on if I'll purchase the app. The exercises are short and energizing, which is the reason I went ahead and started from day 1 again. It's a great program. I plan to skip some of the updates .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate your feedback. In case you have any questions about BetterMe, you can always send us an email at gethelp@betterme.world. Our team would be glad to help. Kind regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: Getting started with any workout program is hard, so this was anticipated & not a problem. But what I'm finding to be a real hindrance is the fact that there seems to be no option to cast the workout to a TV, leaving me straining to glimpse what poses and actions I should be doing or having to stop altogether to figure that out & then restart. Definitely disappointed in the app. Cancelled, and won't use past my initial trial period. There's always YouTube with free workouts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your review. Please contact us at gethelp@betterme.world and our team will gladly provide you with instructions on how to connect the BetterMe app to your TV. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: Information is all good, but there is lots of room for app improvement. Challenges were a disappointment (preset daily message about a generic healthy habit with a linked youtube video for the exercise). The training section is separated into categories, but there is no other way to filter anything. You can find similar exercise sets on youtube/tiktok for free. It feels pretty bare bones for an app, but it has promise if they update features.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for your updated review. We appreciate that you pointed out what needs improvements. Our team is doing its best to present an enhancement of the existing features and add new ones. We hope that you will stay tuned for future updates. Feel free to connect with us at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: These people will offer a 6 dollar trial for 1 week and then auto bill you 40 dollars a month. They are not up front about the billing terms. Terms are buried in their app. I constantly get adds from the trying to sell additions to their plan every time I am in the app. It isn't even a very well thought ut workout. I've seen better for free. THIS IS A SCAM!!!!! And as far as the response, no, they do not make it apparent they would auto bill me 1 week later for 40 dollars for 1 months service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: UPD: Hi. All our plans are based on a subscription. And a 7-day trial period is part of a subsequent 1-month subscription. You can find this info both before and after the payment in your purchase confirmation letter. Please, reach us at gethelp@betterme.world, and we will share all further details. Kind Regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: I just downloaded and pay the fees but I am bit disappointed cuz I tough all programs were included and more structured but you actually need to pay them individually. The free one you can easily find them on YouTube. Not impressed. I was very excited about this app. I will try the 4 weeks because it's been paid off but not guaranteed that I will stay after. ðŸ˜
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your review. Indeed, the app may offer additional activities. Still, users decide to participate or not, as these offers can be easily skipped. We will be glad to assist at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind Regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: So far so good! I really enjoy the guided workouts. Exercise is a hard journey to start because it's hard to know what to focus on to reach your goals. The apps guided workouts makes it easy to just follow along! I'm excited to see what sort of results I get after my 3 months. It motivates me to eat better too, because if I exercise I feel less inclined to put bad food in my body.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your positive feedback! It's great to hear the guided workouts are helping you stay motivated and on track with your health journey. Keep up the fantastic work!

scraped_reviews.content: I have had the app for over a year and use it almost everyday. I really like the recommended workouts since you can spend quite a bit of time looking thru the workout catalog for the right routine for the muscle group you wish to hit. Lately however, it is recommending the same muscle group for consecutive days in a row- 15 to be exact. Not just 1 of 2 exercise videos but both. It also completely chooses not ro work other muscle groups in the meantime.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate that you shared your impression of our workouts. We would be glad to answer any of your questions to make your experience more pleasant and smooth. Feel free to contact us at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app so far, all the bells n whistles, especially the monthly cycle tracking. Only complaints so far is not being able to manually input/edit Calories because most of the searches I find are incorrect and the adding water intake doesn't have a custom amount option. Other than that, it gives me a rough ballpark and a good way to keep most things I track centralized. â¤ï¸
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We appreciate these details of your BetterMe experience. We gather all valuable details, analyze them, and share them with the relevant teams for future improvements. It helps make the service more suitable for people with different needs. Feel free to connect with us at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: What a joke. After paying for the app, nothing looked or felt any different â€” everything that was supposedly â€œpremiumâ€ was already accessible for free. Then they hit you with extra fees if you want to join challenges or unlock more features. Itâ€™s just constant upselling. And donâ€™t waste your time asking for a refund â€” theyâ€™ll find a way to deny it. Save your money and skip this one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for reporting this situation to us. Please be kindly informed that we have found your request - please check your Inbox for details. We are looking forward to receiving your reply in order to assist you further. Kind Regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: So far, the exorcises are engaging and remind me much of yoga. However, even as a beginner I struggle at some of the poses that are listed for those with no experience. You will work up a sweat. You don't need equipment. It even includes calorie intake, recipes, walking tracker, fasting assist, water tracking, and more. I 100% recommend trying it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We are glad to know that you can take advantage of the app and its features. Our team wishes you an interesting and effective wellness journey. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: Be very careful with the buying experience as it's a bit sneaky. There is much scrolling through extra offers that can be very inadvertently clicked on. THEN, there is no option to confirm or reject the purchase if it was in fact an accidental click.... my credit card was immediately charged. I now cannot get anyone to respond. I should've read the reviews carefully before purchasing as this seems to be a problem others have had.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for reporting this situation to us. Please be kindly informed that we have found your request - please check your Inbox for details. We are looking forward to receiving your reply in order to assist you further. Kind Regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: Perfect for an overweight out of shape older person. The exercises are doable, and it feels great to gently work my body. This is not intimidating, and the "toys" make it fun. Be prepared to get your reading glasses out sometimes to see what she's doing, but then you can start the exercise over. It doesn't annoy me. I combine the movement with meditation and am having a positive experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for the feedback, and thank you for choosing BetterMe! We're happy to see you like our workouts. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: I thought I would try the app for a 12 week program. After one day, I cancelled, because I know this app is not for me. It does a horrible job setting you up for the next exercise, with the timer right over the top of the preview. If you aren't familiar with the exercise or the equipment, you will need to wait for the bare minimum explanation given as the timer starts for the actual exercise. I am a week in, and there have been barely any upper body workouts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for sharing your comment. You can see a preview for workouts before you start the whole workout set. We appreciate your feedback, though, and will forward it to our team for future improvements. Feel free to connect with us at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: I've just signed up, and so far, it looks more like a Shopping App than a Workout App. As soon as you select your plan (I went with the most basic one), it keeps on trying to push top tiers on you, even when you skip it. Almost all screens have some sort of "Buy Now" button. Do not use if you have any type of spending addiction. I'll try to keep using to see how the workouts go, but with these many "Buy Now" buttons everywhere, I can already see myself quitting this app after the trial month.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your review. We have a general subscription package with premium features. Indeed, the app may offer additional activities. Still, users decide to participate or not, as these offers can be easily skipped. We will be glad to assist at gethelp@betterme.world. Kind Regards, Team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: I must admit at first I was a bit skeptical and decided to just do the trial run. I was so impressed by my results and the AMAZING coach-Alex, I was paired with. 6 months later still going strong. I would've given 5 stars but there's occasional glitches that make me go through the browser. However, my coach and tech team are always quick to resolve the issue. If accountability is what you need, I HIGHLY recommend giving it a try.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Our team is very happy when our customers feel satisfied. Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback with other users and us. Kind regards, team BetterMe

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I paused my subscription for 4 weeks because I was low on funds. The next day they tried to charge my Debit Card (which I NEVER gave them) for $94.85 - twice! The monthly charge was $21.19. I messaged them asking why they charged me & how they got my debit card information. They didn't answer my questions & just canceled my subscription. I had to cancel my debit card & get a new one. Don't say I didn't warn you!

scraped_reviews.content: I initially signed up for the Pilates workout you see everywhere online. But, under the trainings section, there's SO MUCH MORE! I've done the walking, gym, and today, the one of the somatic sessions (which was an eye opener!). There's about 8 different groups of Pilates, HIIT workouts, stretching, you name it and it's probably there.

scraped_reviews.content: It doesn't take into consideration if your gym doesnt have certain equipment so you cant complete all of them sometimes. For example battle ropes. You cant add your own meals or adjust your own calories. I eat meals from Foodie fit that labels macros and calories but the app only has a select few options, none of which match the calories or macros I am consuming so it makes it useless to track food.

scraped_reviews.content: canceled and was still charged for 2 months. they told me that doesn't qualify for a refund. so they will charge you for months after you cancel. scraped_reviews.content: the app is great but the customer service is better! I used it a few days and got a good workout but ended up needing gym workouts to stay motivated and to get out of my house. Got charged because I didnt realize I had subscribed through the site and customer service was amazing. thank you! Will try again in the future just because the agent was so great!

scraped_reviews.content: NO INTERNET~NO TRUTH! Full, reliable home internet. Every step within the app says, no internet. Especially difficult when in the Help section & Account.
